loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy animals and chicken feed.

loans.name: Jose Cerbelio

texts.es:
José, reside en San Miguel, se dedica a la venta de sorbetes, vive con su familia, tiene tres hijos de 23, 14, 18 años de edad, todos en su familia están involucrados en el negocio, se reparten la mercadería entre sus hijos y salen a vender el producto.
El actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos (sorbetes, paletas), esta inversión le ayudara a tener una fuente de trabajo para su familia y al mismo tiempo ayudar a sus hijos.
Para el futuro aspira administrar una tienda de helados, que sea propia y mejorar las condiciones a su familia.
texts.en:
José lives in San Miguel.  His business is selling sorbets.  He lives with his family and has three children aged 23, 14 and 18.  All of his famliy are involved in the business.  He shares out the merchandise amongst his children and they go out and sell it.

José is currently requesting a loan to buy products (sorbets and ice pops).  This investment will help him to have a source of work for his family and, at the same time, help his children.

His goal for the future is to own and run an ice cream store and to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy products (sorbets and ice pops)

loans.name: Olga Lydia

texts.es:
Olga, vive con sus padres, una hermana y es madre soltera de un niño de 10 años de edad, ella trabaja en la agricultura con la ayuda de sus padres, cultivan maíz, trabaja en tierras propias y no tiene un horario establecido.
Actualmente necesita un préstamo para comprar abono y fertilizantes, este préstamo le ayudara para tener los recursos necesarios y poder desarrollar la siembra de este año.
Ella espera tener una buena cosecha y ayudar a su familia a mejorar la calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Olga is a single mother of a 10 year-old boy and she lives with her parents and a sister.  With the help of her parents, she works in agriculture growing corn, working their own land and has an ever-changing work schedule.

She needs the loan to buy compost and fertilizer. This loan will help to provide the necessary resources and to sow the fields for this year.

She hopes to have a good harvest and help her family to improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizers

loans.name: Walter Emmanuel

texts.es:
Walter, reside en El Transito departamento de San Miguel,  vive con su esposa y su abuelo, no tiene hijos y se dedica a la agricultura, el trabajo se lo enseño su abuelo y hoy día sostiene los gastos del hogar por lo ingresos que recibe, los terrenos que cultiva son propios  y no tiene un horario fijo para trabajar.
El solicita un préstamo para la compra de fertilizantes y abonos, estos materiales son muy necesarios para realizar la siembra y uno de sus riesgos son las condiciones climáticas.
Aspira diversificar el negocio, crecer en sus cultivos, mejorar el nivel de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en:
Walter lives in El Transito, department of San Miguel, with his wife and his grandfather. He has no children and works in agriculture. His grandfather taught him and today he meets his household expenses with the income he receives. The land he farms is his and he does not have a fixed timetable to work. 

He is requesting a loan for the purchase of fertilizers and manure, materials much needed during sowing. Weather conditions can pose a risk. Walter aims to diversify his business, grow his crops and improve the quality of life of the whole family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and manure.

loans.name: Duo Monte Oreb Group

texts.es: Duo Monte Oreb: Doña Cristy Carolina se dedica a la venta y confeccion de tejidos nos cuenta que se dedica a esta actividad desde hace años, y que le ha hido bien porque a logrado abtener munchos clientes a base de su calidad porque es nuy buena en su area ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para seguir confeccionando tejidos,por su parte la señora Ruth tambien se dedica a la venta y confeccion de tejidos ella nos solicita este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos el sueño de ellas es poder tener mas capital para trabajar y agrandar mas su negocio para poder esta bien economicamente.
texts.en: The loan group “Duo Mount Horeb’: Ms Cristy Carolina works making and selling fabrics which she has been doing for years.  It has gone well for her as she has obtained many customers based on her quality, which is very good in her area. She is requesting this loan to buy raw materials to continue making fabrics.  As for Mrs. Ruth, she also makes a living selling manufactured fabrics. She requests a loan for the purchase of raw materials for clothing fabrics with the dream of having more working cash flow to expand her business and improve her personal financial stability.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make fabrics

loans.name: Mario Antonio

texts.es:
Mario, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, es comerciante de ropa y medicinas, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 6 y 4 años, él trabaja en lo propio y sin un horario fijo.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de medicinas, vitaminas, analgésicos, antibióticos, entre otros medicamentos, esta inversión fortalecerá el negocio y ayudara a brindar un mejor servicio a los clientes.
El aspira ampliar la línea de productos, mejorar la clientela y estar en buenas condiciones con su familia.
texts.en:
Mario lives in San Rafael Oriente, San Miguel Department.  He is a clothes and medicine merchant.  He lives with his wife and two children who are 6 and 4 years of age.  He works for himself and does not have a fixed work schedule.

He is asking for a loan to buy medicines, vitamins, analgesics and antibiotics, among other medicines.  This investment will strengthen the business and help him provide better customer service.

He hopes to expand the line of products, to improve his clientele and to be in good condition with his family.

loans.use: to buy medicines, vitamines, analgesics and antibiotics.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Rosa Vilma

texts.es:
Rosa, reside en Santa María, departamento de Usulután, vive con su esposo y un hijo de 28 años, , posee una tienda, que inicio con el apoyo de su esposo, no tiene un horario defino para atender a los clientes.
Ella comprara mercadería para abastecer el negocio por lo que solicita un préstamo y adquirir arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, esto le permitirá tener lo necesario para los clientes y satisfacer la demanda.
Su aspiración es crecer, ampliar el negocio y el numero de clientela, de esta manera mejorar las condiciones económicas de su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa lives in Santa María, Usulután Department with her husband and 28-year-old son.  She has a store that she started with help from her husband.  She does not have a fixed schedule to tend to customers.

She will buy merchandise to stock the store and this is why she’s asked for a loan to buy rice, beans, sugar and oil.  This will make it possible for her to have available everything her customers need and to meet demand.

Her goal is to grow, to expand the business and the number of customers to improve her family’s economic situation.

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, sugar and oil for the store.

loans.name: Fidel Angel

texts.es:
Fidel, reside  en Santa Elena departamento de Usulután, se dedica a la venta de productos lácteos, vive con su familia, su esposa y dos hijos de 28 y 26 años de edad, todos trabajan. Su negocio inicio por sus propios medios, sus hijos le ayudan, no tiene un horario fijo para atender las tareas, y poseen experiencia en la administración del negocio.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para comprar leche, ya que es el material principal para la elaboración de los productos, ayudándole a fortalecer  el negocio.
Su aspiración es montar un negocio grande, con mucha capacidad para atender a la clientela y ofrecer una mejor condición de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Fidel lives in Santa Elena, Usulután Department.  He sells dairy products.  He lives with his family: his wife and two children who are 28 and 26 years old.  Everyone works.

He started his business with his own resources.  His children help him and he does not have a fixed schedule to see to tasks.  They have experience administering the business.

He is asking for a loan to buy milk since it’s the main ingredient to make his products.  This will help him strengthen the business.  His goal is to establish a large business with lots of capacity for customer service and to offer his family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy milk to make dairy products.

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es:
Manuel, reside en Santa Elena, departamento de Usulután, es agricultor y ganadero, vive con sus padres, es soltero y su padre le enseño a conocer el proceso de la agricultura, actualmente necesita dinero para comprar los materiales para iniciar el proceso de la milpa.
El solicita un préstamo que le ayude para preparar la tierra, comprando fertilizantes, tratamientos para plagas y abonos, con esto estará dispuesto a iniciar la siembra.
Su aspiración es crecer en conocimientos agrícolas, tener mejores ingresos y ayudar a la familia con lo necesario.
texts.en:
Manuel lives in Santa Elena, Usulután Department.  He’s a farmer and cattleman.  He lives with his parents and is single.  His father taught him farming and he needs money to buy farming supplies to start processing corn.

He is asking for a loan to prepare the fields buying fertilizer, insecticide and manure which will make him ready to start the planting.  His goal is to increase his knowledge of farming, to earn better income and to help his family with whatever is needed.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticide and manure.

loans.name: Solidario Philipinas Group

texts.es: Solidario Philipinas:Elva Esperanza de 69 años de edad es madre soltera tiene 4 hijos, ella tiene una alta experiancia en comercio ya por eso el la presidenta del grupo ella se inicio vendiendo ropa usada y despues vendio frutas y actual mente tiene una tortilleria en su domicilio ella nos comenta que este negocio si a prosperado ya que se vende demaciado por estar en una zona centrada en su comunidad ella solicita este credito para la compra de leña y maiz para su tortilleria, las otras socias Ingrid y Dilia tambien se dedican a la tartilleria por lo mismo tambien solicitan este credito para la compra de leña y maiz para su tortilleria.
texts.en: Philipinas Group: Elva Esperanza is 69 years old and she is a single mother of 4. She has a great deal of experience in commerce which is why she is the leader of the group. She started out selling used clothing and later she sold fruits. Currently she has a tortillas production and sales business in her home. She stays that this business has succeeded especially because she is located in a central region in her community. She requests this loan to purchase firewood and corn for her tortilla business. The other members of the group also have tortilla businesses and they also request loans to purchase firewood and corn.

loans.use: Compra de maiz y leña para tortilleria

loans.name: Angela Maria

texts.es:
Ángela, reside en Santa Elena departamento de Usulután, se dedica a la ganadería, agricultura y crianza de cerdos, vive con sus padres y dos hermanos, es soltera y cuenta con el apoyo de su padre y hermanos para realizar las labores de campo.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para comprar cerdos pequeños, esta inversión le permitirá ampliar la granja y en un futuro sus ventas mejoraran.
Ella aspira ser una comerciante en grande, potencializar su negocio de cerdos, tener más clientela y que su familia este en buenas condiciones.
texts.en:
Ángela lives in Santa Elena, Usulután Department.  She raises livestock, farm and raises pigs.  She lives with her parents and two siblings.  She’s single and her father and brothers help her with the field chores.

She is asking for a loan to buy piglets.  This investment will help her enlarge her farm so that future sales will improve.  She aims at being a large merchant, enhancing her pig selling business, having more customers and seeing that her family is in good condition.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Mabel Antonia

texts.es:
Mabel, resiD. en Concepción Batres, departamento D. Usulután, se dedica a la venta D. productos lácteos y ropa, vive con su esposo y una hija D. 26 años quien es madre D. dos pequeños niños, ella inicio el negocio contando con la ayuda D. su madre, lo tiene ubicado en su propia casa y a la vez sale a ofrecer a las colonias cercanas, sin tener un horario establecido.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para comprar ropa y productos lácteos como queso, crema, cuajada, quesillo, con esta compra le dará mayor fuerza al negocio, capacidad para atender la demanda  y ampliar sus ventas.
Ella quiere ser una mujer D. negocios, con capacidad para desarrollarse en el comercio y ofrecer a su familia una condicione D. vida estable.
texts.en:
Mabel lives in Concepción Batres, Usulután Department.  She sells dairy products and clothes.  She lives with her husband and 26-year-old daughter who is the mother of two small children.  She started the business with help from her mother and it’s located in her home but she also goes out to neighboring areas to sell her products with no set work schedule.

She is asking for a loan to buy clothes and dairy products like cheese, cream, cottage cheese, etc.  This purchase will strengthen the business, her capacity to respond to customer demand and expand her sales.

She wants to be a businesswoman with capacity for development in commerce and to proviD. her family with stable living conditions.

loans.use: to buy clothes and dairy products.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
Norma tiene 48 años y es madre D. familia D. tres niños que tiene a cargo en su pequeño hogar, ubicado en la zona urbana D. La Victoria, distrito D. la provincia D. Chiclayo. 

DesD. hace 5 años el patio trasero D. la casa D. Norma se ha convertido en un corral, donD. Norma se dedica a criar patos y pequines (raza D. patos) para comercializarlos.

Norma desea ampliar su negocio con la compra D. más patos para criar y así  darles una mejor calidad D. vida a sus hijos y esto lo conseguirá  expandiendo sus ventas  hacia mercados mayoristas y  restaurantes. Es por ello que solicita un préstamo D.  500 nuevos soles  a Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Norma, 48, is a mother of three children that she cares for in her small house located in the La Victoria urban zone, a district in Chiclayo Province.

Since about five years ago Norma’s back yard has become a corral where Norma raises ducks and “Pequines” (a breed of ducks) to sell.

Norma wants to expand the business with the purchase of more ducks to raise in order to proviD. her children with improved quality of life.  She will attain this expanding her sales into wholesale markets and restaurants.  Because of this she is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 500 new sol loan.

loans.use: to buy more ducks to raise.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
Jorge, reside en El Transito, departamento de San Miguel, vive con su madre y una sobrina, es soltero y solamente él trabaja en una panadería, inicio por sus amigos, quienes influyeron para que iniciara el negocio.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para comprar harina, azúcar, huevos, aceite, leche, entre otros que son necesarios para preparar el pan, esta compra le ayudara a tener los materiales necesarios para la producción y así atender de una mejor manera a los clientes.
Sueña con ser un comerciante de éxito, tener sus propios negocios y vivir en condiciones  dignas junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Jorge lives in El Transito, San Miguel Department, with his mother and a niece.  He is single and works in a bakery that he started thanks to friends who encouraged him to start the business.

He is asking for a loan to buy flour, eggs, sugar, oil and milk, among other, that are needed to make bread.  This purchase will help him have the ingredients that are necessary for production and therefore provide better customer service.

He dreams with becoming a successful merchant, owning his own businesses and living with his family in dignified conditions.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, eggs, oil and milk.

loans.name: Hilder Manuel

texts.es:
Hilder un joven soltero de 25 años de edad que radica en Olmos, vive en una casa alquilada en la zona urbana de dicho distrito contando con algunos servicios (luz y agua).  Olmos es un distrito donde se desarrolla la actividad agricola principalmente, está ubicado a unos 40 minutos de la provincia y mas de una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Hilder recorre los caserios de Olmos en busca de animales para comprarlos, engordarlos y posteriormente venderlos como el ganado ovino (ovejas), caprino (chanchos) y  aves de corral. Cuenta con una experiencia de 2 años en esta actividad. Cría los animales en corrales cerca a su domicilio para que sea de fácil acceso.  A los animales los alimenta con comida balanceada (granos y pastos naturales), también cría animales que son propios, la venta lo realiza en el mercado del mismo distrito.

Este préstamo es para comprar mas animales y engordarlos para su posterior venta, también una parte del préstamo será para la compra de alimentos balanceados para seguir alimentando a dichos animales y obtener mayores ganancias. Para lo cual ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles para poder lograr su meta.

A pesar de ser Hilder una persona joven ha demostrado anteriormente a esta empresa lo responsable, trabajador y las ganas de seguir saliendo adelante para así mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Hilder is a young, 25-year-old, single man living in a rented house in the urban zone of Olmos, an area that has some basic utilities (electricity and water).  Olmos is a district where the main activity is farming and it’s located about 40 minutes from the province and over an hour from the city of Chiclayo.

Hilder goes around the hamlets in Olmos seeking animals, like sheep, goats, pigs and barnyard fowl, to buy, fatten up and later sell.  He’s been in this line of work for 2 years.  He raises the animals in corrals near his home so that he can access them easily.  He feeds the animals with nutritionally balanced feed (grains and natural grasses).  He also raises animals to keep.  He carries out his sales at the local district market.

This loan is to buy more animals to fatten up for subsequent sale.  Part of the loan will also be used to purchase nutritionally balanced feed to continue feeding said animals and obtain higher profits.  To reach his goal, he’s asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan.

Despite Hilder’s being a young person he has demonstrated previously to this firm how responsible, hard working and dedicated to succeed and continue getting ahead to improve his quality of life he is.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Roger Aureliano

texts.es:
Roger  es un padre soltero de 34 años, que tiene un hijo por el cual trabaja arduamente. Roger vive en el distrito de Cayalti en la provincia de Chiclayo, una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería. Vive junto a sus padres quienes lo ayudan en su negocio. La familia de Roger es una familia muy unida que cuenta con buenas referencias.

El negocio de Roger consiste en la venta de pequeños platos de comida  y cervezas y además de ello, cría aves de corral junto a su padre.

Roger solicita un crédito de 1000  nuevos soles para implementar su negocio con la compra de cervezas y víveres de mejor calidad para ganar nuevos clientes y mejorar la atención de sus clientes asiduos. 

Esto beneficiará a Roger creándole más ingresos para darle a su hijo mayores comodidades y además  contribuir en los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Roger, 34, is a single father.  He has a son that he works hard for.  Roger lives in Cayalti District in Chiclayo Province, a community dedicated to commerce, farming and raising livestock.  He lives with his parents who help him in the business.  Roger’s family is very united and has good references.

Roger’s business consists in selling small dishes of food and beer.  In addition to that, he raises barnyard fowl with his father.

Roger is asking for a 1000 new sol loan to stock his business with beer and foodstuffs of better quality in order to win over new customers and improve service to his regular ones.  This will benefit Roger creating more income to provide more comforts to his son as well as contribute to family expenses.

loans.use: to buy beer and foodstuffs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cages to raise guinea pigs.

loans.name: Victoriano Candelario

texts.es:
Victoriano, reside en Usulután, se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijol, vive en casa propia, vive con su esposa y una hija de 5 años de edad, él trabaja la tierra desde hace 6 años y aprendió de su padre.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para pagar el alquiler del terreno y compra de abono y fertilizantes, este préstamo le ayudara a tener las herramientas y todo lo necesario para la siembra.
El sueña con algún día cultivar sus propias tierras, piensa que con trabajo y mucho esfuerzo lograra realizarlo.
texts.en:
Victoriano lives in Usulután and grows corn and beans for a living. He owns a home and lives with his wife and 5-year-old daughter. He has been working the land, a skill he learned from his father, for 6 years. He is currently requesting this loan to pay rent for the farm land and to purchase both chemical and organic fertilizers. This loan will help him to obtain the tools and everything he needs for sowing.

He dreams of one day cultivating his own crop fields, and he thinks that with hard work and much effort, he will be able to achieve that dream.

loans.use: to pay rent for farm land and to purchase both chemical and organic fertilizers.

loans.name: María

texts.es:
María forma parte del banco comunal “Cuenta conmigo” perteneciente a la ciudad de Coronel. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa y artículos de paquetería que le solicitan sus clientes a pedido, además otorga facilidades de pago a sus clientes. Realiza éste negocio en su casa desde hace 14 años. Su negocio lo realiza entre los meses de marzo a diciembre.
Su mercadería la compra en la ciudad de Santiago por lo cual viaja una vez a la semana, para comprar novedosos productos entre estos; ropa interior, chaquetas, abrigos, blazer, joyas de plata y oro. Productos que generalmente son pedidos por sus clientes.
Además transforma todo lo que son joyas de oro y de plata, cuando estas se encuentran en mal estado. 
Con el préstamo comprará ropa y un closet para guardar su mercadería.
Sus metas en su negocio son establecerse e instalar una boutique en su misma casa, para concretar éste proyecto debe ampliar su casa y acceder a los permisos para el inicio de actividades. 
María sufrió un accidente laboral el año 1988, que la mantuvo en una difícil situación de salud, sin embargo logró recuperarse y emprender a pesar de ésta  situación.
Ella vive junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos.
Sus sueños son seguir trabajando para brindarles a sus hijos una mejor situación socioeconómica, además de costear los estudios superiores de sus ellos.
María está muy contenta y agradecida de participar de Fondo Esperanza, ya que con la ayuda del crédito, ha podido invertir en su negocio. Comenta que es lo mejor que le pudo pasar a la dueña de casa y emprendedores, ya que ella ha podido independizarse económicamente.
Respecto a las reuniones se siente muy bien, ya que estas son amenas y el grupo de socias del Banco comunal es solidario. Los cursos impartidos de ventas y contabilidad, le ha permitido aprender e integrar estos conocimientos a su negocio para distribuir sus gastos e ingresos. 
Coronel es una comuna ubicada al sur de Chile, cerca de la ciudad de Concepción, región del Biobío. Posee una economía basada en servicios, explotación forestal, agricultura. Cuenta también con una importante tradición minera en carbón, actividad que ya no se realiza, pero de la cual quedó la mina de carbón “Chiflón Puchoco”, convertida ahora en museo minero.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the “Cuenta Conmigo” (Count on Me) Communal Bank, pertaining to the city of Coronel. She sells clothing and elegant wear ordered by her customers, and she offers them time payments. For 14 years, she has conducted business between March and December from her home.

Maria buys her merchandise in the city of Santiago, traveling there once a week to purchase new products, including underwear, jackets, coats, blazers, and silver and gold jewelry – all products generally requested by her customers. Maria also upgrades gold and silver jewelry when it is in bad condition. With this loan she will buy clothing and a closet to secure her merchandise. Maria's business goals are to establish and install a boutique in her home. To do this, she needs to expand her home and obtain the permits required to initiate activities.

Maria suffered a work accident in 1988 that left her with a difficult health situation. But she managed to recover and to get ahead despite this situation. She lives with her husband and their 2 children.

Maria's dreams are to continue working in order to offer her children a better socioeconomic situation, and to be able to pay for their higher education. Maria is very content and grateful to participate in Fondo Esperanza. With the help of loans, it has been possible to invest in her business. She comments that the best is that she has been able to become a homeowner and an entrepreneur, and economically independent. Maria also feels very good about the Bank meetings because she finds these quite agreeable and the bank's members show solidarity. The courses imparted concerning sales and accounting have permitted her to learn and integrate this knowledge of how to distribute its costs and income into her business.

Coronel is a community located in the south of Chile, near the city of Concepcion, in the Biobio region. It possesses an economy based on  services, forestry, and agriculture. It used to count on traditional coal mining, an activity that is no longer carried out, but the “Chiflon Puchoco” mine remains, now converted into a mining museum.

loans.use: to purchase clothes and a closet to secure her merchandise.

loans.name: Blanca Yanira

texts.es:
Blanca, reside en Puerto el Triunfo, departamento de Usulután, es soltera y vive con sus padres, administra una tienda y venta de frescos, inicio hace 8 años con la tienda y hace 3 con la venta de frescos.
Actualmente necesita comprar un frisser y comprar mercadería para la tienda como: galletas, boquitas, bebidas y más, la compra de esta mercadería ayudara a incrementar el inventario y mejorar las ventas.
Su aspiración es ampliar el negocio y tener la capacidad de administrar dos negocios.
texts.en:
Blanca lives in Puerto el Triunfo, located in the department of Usulután. She is single and lives with her parents. She runs a store and sells drinks. She started the store 8 years ago, and she has been selling drinks for 3 years.

She currently needs to purchase a freezer and goods such as cookies, snacks, drinks, and more. Purchasing this merchandise will help her increase her inventory and improve sales.

Her goal is to expand her business and to be able to manage both businesses.

loans.use: to purchase a freezer and goods like cookies, snacks, drinks, and more.

loans.name: Carmen De Jesus

texts.es:
Carmen, resiD. en Jiquilisco departamento D. Usulután, se dedica a la venta D. verduras, vive con sus hijos D. 30 y 25 años D. edad, hace 9 años tiene el negocio D. verduras y trabaja todos los días D. la semana.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra D. verduras: papas, yuca, pipián, ejotes, plátanos, esta compra  le servirá para aumentar el inventario D. su negocio, disponer D. variedad para ofrecer a los clientes productos frescos.
Su aspiración es aumentar sus ventas y sus ingresos, para estabilizar la condición económica D. su familia.
texts.en:
Carmen resides in Jiquilisco, in the department of Usulután. She sells vegetables for a living and lives with her children ages 30 and 25. She has been running this vegetable business for 9 years, working every day of the week.

She is currently requesting this loan in order to purchase produce such as potatoes, cassava, squash, green beans, and plantains. This purchase will help her to increase her inventory and offer a greater variety of fresh produce to her customers.

Her aspiration is to boost sales and profits so that her family can have a stable financial situation.

loans.use: to purchase potatoes, cassava, squash, green beans, and plantains.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fabric and thread.

loans.name: Duo Pan Ab'aj Group

texts.es: Duo Panab'aj:este grupo esta conformado por dos señoras las cuales se dedican a la confeccion de tejidos a mano, Ixkik tiene barios años de trabajar en esta actividad esta muy contenta porque supo de la fundacion y ella dice que le pueda ayudar con un credito ya que ella nos cuenta que nececita de mas capital para trabajar porque le han hecho pedidos grandes y no cuenta con suficiente capital para trabajar, solicita este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos tambien la otra socia esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos.
texts.en: Panab'aj Duo: This group is composed of two women who craft hand-made knits. Ixkik has many years with her business and she is very happy because she knew of Fundacion (Kiva Field Partner) that would be able to help her with a loan. She says that she needs more capital to work with because large orders have been placed. She doesn't have enough capital to work with. She needs a loan to purchase materials to craft her knits. The other member also requests this loan to purchase materials to craft knits.

loans.use: to purchase materials for knittnig.

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es:
María, reside en Jiquilisco departamento de Usulután, se dedica a la venta de pupusas, licuados y también comercializa cerdos, es una persona de familia, vive con su esposo; lleva cinco años de dedicarse a la pupuseria y crianza de cerdos.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales y ampliar la granja de los cerdos, para lo cual necesita, madera, maya, clavos, también aprovechara para comprar materia prima para las pupusas, chicharrón, quesillo, pollo, maíz y aceite, este préstamo sin duda será una gran fortaleza para María, pues sus dos negocios se verán beneficiados.
Su aspiración es aumentar el chalet ofreciendo más alimentos a los clientes, también que su granja de cerdos crezca y generar más ingresos para la economía del hogar.
texts.en:
Maria lives in Jiquilisco, located in the department of Uslután. She sells pupusas--a traditional Salvadoran dish made of handmade corn flat bread stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, and/or refried beans--and shakes, and she sells pigs. She has a family and lives with her husband. She has been selling pupusas and raising pigs for five years.

She is currently requesting a loan in order to purchase materials and expand her pig farm, so she needs lumber, agricultural fencing, and nails. She will also take this opportunity to purchase ingredients to make pupusas like pork rinds, cheese, chicken, cornmeal, and cooking oil. This loan will without a doubt give strength to Maria since her businesses will benefit.

Her aspiration is to expand her food business, offering more meals to her customers. She also hopes that her pig farm grows so that she can generate a bigger income for the household.

loans.use: to purchase pork rinds, cheese, chicken, cornmeal, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Roberto Antonio

texts.es:
Roberto, se dedica a la venta de mariscos, ropa nueva, cocos, sandia y maíz, todos estos productos los vende desde hace 10 años, vive con su esposa y sus hijos, reside en Usulután.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para mejorar el vehículo y la compra de más productos para la venta, dicho préstamo le ayudara para pagar mecánico, comprar maíz y mariscos, esto le permitirá estar en mejores condiciones.
Su objetivo es ampliar las rutas de ventas, comprarse un vehículo más nuevo,  y crecer en las ventas, de esta manera garantizar una vida más confortable a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Roberto sells seafood, new clothing, coconuts, watermelon, and corn for a living. He has been selling all these products for 10 years. He lives with his wife and children in Usulután.

He is currently requesting a loan so that he can repair his vehicle and purchase more merchandise. This loan will help him pay the mechanic and purchase corn and seafood, which will allow him to obtain a better quality of life.

His goal is to expand his sales area, purchase a newer vehicle, and boost sales, thus guaranteeing a more comfortable life for his children.

loans.use: to pay the mechanic and purchase corn and seafood.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, cookies, candy, and other goods.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos H.  es vecino de la comunidad de Pilas en Pérez Zeledón, es conocido por ser un agricultor muy trabajador.
En este momento el desea  obtener un préstamo de ₡500 000 (quinientos mil colones) para sembrar 20 hectáreas  de ñampi. Para ello necesita los insumos necesarios y la mano de obra. Esta es la mejor época del año para hacerlo y es por eso quiere aprovechar para mejorar sus ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos. 
El es socio de la empresa de Crédito Comunal La Danta S.A una de las 110 empresas socias de EDESA en Costa Rica.
texts.en:
Carlos H. comes from the Pilas community in Pérez Zeledón, and he is known for being a very hardworking farmer.

At this time, he would like to obtain a 500,000 CRC loan so that he can plant 20 hectares of ñampi, a tropical vegetable used for its thickened stems. For this, he needs both the necessary supplies and labor. This is the best time of the year to cultivate, which is why he would like to take advantage so that he can improve both his income and his children's quality of life. He is a member of Crédito Comunal La Danta S.A., one of the 110 organizations that have a partnership with EDESA in Costa Rica.

loans.use: to grow ñampi, a tropical vegetable used for its thickened stems.

loans.name: Jose Ramiro

texts.es:
José, es agricultor, vive con su esposa y demás familiares, el reside en Jiquilisco departamento de Usulután, tiene 6 años de dedicarse al cultivo de maíz y pipián, aprendió de su padre los quehaceres agrícolas, hoy día es el trabajo que realiza con mucha dedicación, para llevar la alimentación a su hogar.
Él solicita un préstamo para la preparación del terreno comprando abono y fertilizantes, con estos materiales dará una buena preparación a la tierra para lograr una buena producción.
Su objetivo es tener una buena cosecha del cultivo, trabajar por el bienestar de su familia y por superarse.
texts.en:
Jose is a farmer who lives with his wife and other family members in Jiquilisco, located in the department of Usulután. He has been growing corn and squash for 6 years, having learned farming from his father. Today, he farms with much dedication in order to nourish his household.

He is requesting a loan in order to prepare his fields by purchasing both organic and chemical fertilizers. With these materials, he will better prepare the crop fields for good production.

His goal is to have a good harvest, to work for his family's well-being, and to improve himself.

loans.use: to purchase chemical and organic fertilizers.

loans.name: Lucia De Jesus

texts.es:
Lucia, reside en Jiquilisco departamento de Usulután, se dedica a la venta de tamales, quesadilla, conserva y también la agricultura, ella vive en compañía de su esposo y tres hijos, aprendió ayudando a otras personas comerciantes y tiene 12 años de estar dedicada a esta actividad.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para el pago de alquiler del terreno para cultivar, también comprar abono y fertilizantes, este préstamo le ayudara a tener en buenas condiciones el terreno alquilado para iniciar la siembra.
Ella espera que su producción aumente, y poder proveer para sus hijos los ingresos necesarios y que estos puedan superarse.
texts.en:
Lucia lives in Jiquilisco, in Usulután department.  She sells tamales, quesadillas and canned goods.  She also farms.  She lives with her husband and three children.  She learned by helping other salespeople and has twelve years experience in this business.

Lucia is currently requesting a loan to pay the rent on her plot of land so that she can grow crops.  She will also buy manure and fertilizers.  This loan will help her to have her rented land in good condition so that she can start sowing.

Lucia hopes that her production will increase.  She hopes that she will be able to provide her children with the income they need and that they will be able to improve themselves.

loans.use: to pay rent on her plot of land so that she can grow crops, and to buy manure and fertilizers

loans.name: Pelelina

texts.en:
Pelelina is 32 years of age and married with nine children. Pelelina owns & operates a business planting & harvesting taro for sale.  She has three years of experience in this business.  Pelelina needs a loan of WST $1,000 to purchase weed killer, gromozone and sacks of fertilizers to improve the business.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 350 talas per week) to improve/expand the business.

Pelelina joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Pelelina's third loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase weed killer, gromozone and sacks of fertilizers

loans.name: Edwin

texts.es:
Edwin V. V. vive en Pilas de Pérez Zeledón y se ha dedicado toda su vida a la agricultura.
Don Edwin tiene una pequeña finquita en la cual quiere sembrar tubérculos. Específicamente jengibre   y ñampi. Para eso necesita un préstamo de ₡500 000 (quinientos mil colones) para comprar los insumos necesarios para la siembra de los tubérculos. 
El espera sacar provecho de la temporada y aumentar sus ingresos, para el beneficio de su familia.
El es socio de la empresa de Crédito Comunal La Danta S.A una de las 110 empresas socias de EDESA en Costa Rica.
texts.en:
Edwin V. V. lives in Pilas de Pérez Zeledón.  He has devoted his whole life to farming.  Edwin has a small farm where he grows tubers.  Specifically, he grows ginger and “ñampi” (a vegetable in the sweet potato family).

He needs a loan of 500,000 colones to buy the needed supplies to sow the tubers.

He hopes to take advantage of the season and increase his income for his family’s benefit.  He is a member of the La Danta S.A communal credit company, which is one of the 110 organizations affiliated with EDESA in Costa Rica.

loans.use: to sow tubers.

loans.name: Kaisarina

texts.en:
Kaisarina is 42 years of age and married with seven children. Kaisarina owns & operates a business selling baked goods in the local community.  She has two years of experience in this business. Kaisarina needs a loan of WST $2,000 to purchase additional products to sell.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 300 talas per week) to improve/expand the business.

Kaisarina joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Kaisarina's third loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell

loans.name: Aomalotasi

texts.en:
Aomalotasi is 39 years of age, married and has seven children. Aomalotasi owns & operates a business planting & harvesting fruits & vegetables for sale.  She has 1 year of experience in this business. Aomalotasi needs a loan of WST $1000 to invest in expanding her business. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 400 talas or US $167 per week) to improve and expand her business.

In 2011, Aomalotasi joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral. This is Aomalotasi's 1st loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to invest in expanding the business.

loans.name: Talitakumi

texts.en:
Talitakumi is 38 years of age, married and has six children. Talitakumi owns & operates a business selling baked goods in the local community. She has 1 year of experience in this business. Talitakumi needs a loan of WST $1000 to purchase new items to expand product offering. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 350 talas or US $146 per week) to improve and expand her business.

In 2011, Talitakumi joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral. This is Talitakumi's 1st loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand the product offering.

loans.name: Duo Las Colaboradoras Group

texts.es: Duo las colaboradoras.:este grupo esta conformado por doña Maria quien se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace varios años en su comunidad ella nos cienta que le a hido muy bien ya que pues su ventas an aumentado considerable mente ella solicita este credito para la compra de ropa por mayor porque ella dice que le venden mas barato y asi de la misma manera aumentar sus ganacias ella es la lider de este grupo, doña Maria Lucita tambien se dedica a la venta de carne y solicita este credito para la compra de mas carne para la venta.
texts.en: Las Colaboradoras Duo: This group is composed of Maria who has been selling clothes for many years in her community and she tells us that it has done very well. Her sales have increased considerably. She requests a loan to purchase clothing in wholesale because it is sold at a more affordable price. This will help her increase her profits. She is the leader of the group. Maria Lucita sells meats and she requests a loan to purchase more meat for resale.

loans.use: to purchase clothing in wholesale.

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es:
Carmen es una madre de familia de 27 años que no cuenta con una casa propia, pero vive junto con su hijo en casa de unos familiares que lo ayudan a cuidarlo mientras ella trabaja. Vive en el distrito de Saqa que se encuentra la provincia Chiclayo.  Este distrito se caracteriza por ser una zona turística y la gente se dedica a la agricultur y ganadería.

Carmen se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral como gallinas y patos, sus corrales de crianza se encuentran en la parte externa de su casa.  A sus animales los alimenta con comida balanceada y una vez que estos han llegadoa su desarrollo óptimo los ofrece a la venta a los pobladores de ese distrito como también lo comercilaiza a otras personas foraneas.

Con el préstamo que le piensan dar va a comprar más animales de corral y alimentos para los mismos, y  así solventar sus gastos o necesidades económicas.  Por eso ha visto conveniente solicitar dicho préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles, con el único fin de poder sacar a su hijo adelante dándole una mejor calidad de vida.

Carmen es una madre de familia que quiere superarse en la vida siendo responsable y empeñosa en todo lo que hace y así sacar adelante a su hijo.
texts.en:
Carmen is a 27-year old mother who lives in the home of some relatives since she doesn't have her own house.   The family helps her by taking care of her son while she works.  She lives in the Saqa district in Chiclayo province- a tourist area where most of the people are in farming or cattle raising.

Carmen raises poultry such as hens and ducks in pens behind her house.  She feeds the birds a balanced diet and once they have grown to an optimal size, she sells them to the people in the district who in turn sell them to people from outside her area.

She will use the loan to buy more birds and food for them, and thus take care of her expenses and needs.    She decided to request a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 1000 new sols with the goal of helping her son get ahead and to have a better quality of life.

Carmen is a mother who wants to improve her life by being responsible and hard-working in everthing she does and in this way improve her son's life.

loans.use: To buy poultry and animal feed

loans.name: Jose Rigoberto

texts.es:
José, reside en San Miguel, se dedica a la venta de artesanía y ropa, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 14 y 5 años de edad, inicio en el comercio con un hermano, luego se independizo, instalo su propio puesto de venta en el mercado municipal de San Miguel.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de artesanía y prendas de vestir, como blusas y camisas de vestir, también pantalones y vestidos. Esta inversión le ayudara a incrementar la mercadería y tener mayor capacidad para atender a los clientes.
Su objetivo a futuro es tener un negocio auto sostenible, que su familia este en mejores condiciones económicas y sus hijos puedan superarse.
texts.en:
José resides in San Miguel and sells handicrafts and clothing. He lives with his wife and two children, ages 14 and 5. José started in this trade with his brother, but he later became independent and established his own vending post at the municipal market in San Miguel.

He is currently requesting a loan to buy handicrafts and articles of clothing such as blouses, dress shirts, trousers, and dresses. This investment will help him expand his inventory of merchandise so that he can increase his capacity to attend to his customers.

His goal for the future is to have a self-sustaining business so that his family will be in a better financial condition and his children will be able to succeed.

loans.use: to purchase handicrafts and clothing to sell.

loans.name: Pulekeria

texts.en:
Pulekeria is 22 years old, married and has two children. Pulekeria owns & operates a business running bingo games. She has 1 year of experience in this business. Pulekeria needs a loan of WST $1000 to purchase game prizes such as washing powder, snacks, soaps, sacks of flour and sugar. She plans to use the profits from her business (estimated to be 600 talas or US $250 per week) to improve and expand her business.

In 2011, Pulekeria joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral. This is Pulekeria's 1st loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase game prizes such as washing powder, snacks,soaps, sacks of flour and sugar.

loans.name: Faleulu

texts.en:
Faleulu is 31 years of age. She is married and has two children. Faleulu owns & operates a business venture, selling beef products in the local community. She has many years of experience in this business. Faleulu needs a loan of WST $2000 to purchase the raw ingredients needed to make products for sale. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 500 talas or US $208 per week) to improve and expand her business.

Faleulu joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral. This is Faleulu's 3rd loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale.

loans.name: Iuliana

texts.en:
Iuliana is 20 years of age and married. She has no children. Iuliana owns & operates a business venture selling baked goods in the local community. She has 1 year of experience in this business. Iuliana needs a loan of WST $1000 to purchase additional products to sell. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 300 talas or US $125 per week) to improve and expand her business.

In 2011, Iuliana joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral. This is Iuliana's 1st loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase additional products to sell.

loans.name: Pea

texts.en:
Pea is 58 years of age. She is married and has five children. Pea owns & operates a business venture, providing new clothing services to local community members. She has 3 years of experience in this business. Pea needs a loan of WST $2500 to purchase additional fabrics & materials. She plans to use the profits from her business (estimated to be 400 talas or US $167 per week) to improve and expand her business.

In 2007, Pea joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral. This is Pea's 6th loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase additional fabrics & materials.

loans.name: Lusi

texts.en:
Lusi is 36 years of age and married with no children. She owns a business planting and harvesting taro for sale. She has one year's experience in this business and needs a loan of WST $1500 to purchase weed-killers such as Gramoxome. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 400 talas or US $167 per week) to improve and expand the business.

In 2009, Lusi joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral. This is Lusi's second loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase weed-killers such as Gramoxome

loans.name: Jose Francisco

texts.es: José Francisco R. L., tiene la edad de 25 años, está casado  y vive con su hijo y su esposa que son sus mayores prioridades. El lo que pretende con el préstamo es comprar la semilla para su siembra y luego sus insumos para su posterior asistencia. El cuenta con la experiencia en la producción de este cultivo y con el terreno apto para su explotación por lo cual es que invertirá. El quiere generar ganancias para su bienestar y la de su familia y así poderles dar una mejor calidad de vida a futuro. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
José Francisco R. L. is 25 years old, married, and lives with his wife and son who are his highest priorities. He intends to use this loan to buy seeds for planting and supplies that he will need later to maintain his crops. José has experience producing this type of crop and suitable land to be used for this purpose. He wants to generate income for the welfare of himself and his family so that they can have a better quality of life and a better future.

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. José has not had any previous loans with the state banks. FUDECOSUR is providing this loan with better terms and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and supplies for growing beans.

loans.name: Valelia

texts.en:
Valelia is 25 years of age and married with three children. She has a business planting and harvesting taro for sale. She has three years of experience in this business. Valelia needs a loan of WST $1400 to purchase weed-killers such as Gramoxome.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 500 talas or US $208 per week) to improve the general living conditions of her family.

Valelia joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Valelia's second loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase weed-killers such as Gramoxome

loans.name: Fualili

texts.en:
Fualili is 29 years of age and married with three children. She has a business catching and selling ocean-caught fish. She has two years of experience in this business. Fualili needs a loan of WST $1000 to purchase fishing equipment such as hooks and nets.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 450 talas or US $188 per week) to improve the general living conditions of her family.

Fualili joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Fualili's first loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase fishing equipments such as hooks & nets

loans.name: Aia

texts.en:
Aia is 41 years of age and married with three children. She has a business catching and selling ocean-caught fish.  She has one year of experience in this business. Aia needs a loan of WST $1000 to purchase fishing equipment such as hooks & nets.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 300 talas or US $125 per week) to improve the general living conditions of her family.

Aia joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Aia's 1st loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase fishing equipment such as hooks & nets

loans.name: Reiman

texts.es: Reiman A. C., tiene la edad de 26 años, está casado  y vive con su hijo y su esposa que son sus mayores prioridades. El lo que pretende es hacer la compra de los insumos y fertilizantes y así hacer una buena siembra del cultivo y en el momento más apto para sembrar. El  cuenta con el terreno apto y la experiencia para desarrollar un buen cultivo. El quiere generar los ingresos necesarios para una mejor calidad de vida en el futuro   y poderle dar el estudio al hijo en su momento. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Reiman A. C. is 26 years old, married, and lives with his wife and son who are his highest priorities. He plans to purchase supplies and fertilizers so that he can achieve a good crop and provide the most suitable conditions for planting. Reiman has adequate land and experience in producing a good crop. He wants to generate the necessary income to achieve a better quality of life and provide his son with an education.

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. Reiman has not had any other previous loans with the state banks. FUDECOSUR is providing this loan with better terms and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and supplies for planting beans.

loans.name: Ruta

texts.en:
Ruta is 18 years of age and married with one child. She a business planting and harvesting taro for sale.  She has a year of experience in this business. Ruta needs a loan of WST $1000 to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 300 talas or US $125 per week) to improve the general living conditions of her family.

Ruta joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Ruta's first loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings and young crops to raise

loans.name: Folorita

texts.en:
Folorita is 37 years of age and married with three children. She has owned and operated a business selling dairy products in the local community for 3 years. Folorita needs a loan of WST 1500 to purchase additional products to sell.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 260 talas or US $108 per week) to financially support immediate members of her family.

In 2010, Folorita joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Folorita's 2nd loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase additional dairy products to sell

loans.name: Utuoge Faalolo

texts.en:
Utuoge Faalolo P. is 72 years old, married, and has three children. She owns and operates a business selling pancakes, which she has been doing for two years. Utuoge Faalolo is requesting a loan of 1,000 WST, which she will use to purchase raw ingredients needed to make pancakes.  She plans to use the profit from her business, estimated to be $83 per week, to improve and expand her business.

In 2011, Utuoge Faalolo joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral.  This is Utuoge Faalolo's first loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients needed to make pancakees

loans.name: Alban

texts.es: Alban A. C., tiene la edad de 30 años, está casado  y vive con sus 2 hijos y su esposa que son sus mayores prioridades. El pretende con el dinero realizar la preparación del terreno para que esté en buenas condiciones y así facilitar  su siembra. El cuenta con experiencia en este cultivo y quiere lograr una mayor producción de frijol por lo cual le hará esta asistencia al terreno para así obtener mejoras este año en cuanto a producción. El con esto quiere generar las ganancias e ingresos para su bienestar familiar y también para seguir invirtiendo en esto y crecer como agricultor  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Alban A. C. is 30 years old, married, and lives with his wife and two children who are his highest priorities. He intends to use the money for preparing his land so that it will be in good condition to facilitate planting. Alban has experience in cultivating crops and wants to achieve better bean production. For this reason, he is requesting assistance for his land so that his production will improve this year. He hopes to generate earnings and income for the welfare of his family. In addition, he wants to continue investing in his land and grow as a farmer.

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. Alban has not had any previous loans with the state banks. FUDECOSUR is providing this loan with better terms and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase farming supplies for growing beans.

loans.name: Lizandro

texts.es:
Lizandro es un padre D. familia  D. 28 años que vive con su esposa y menor hijo, tienen casa propia situada en el distrito D. José Leonardo Ortiz.  Este distrito se caracteriza por ser una zona muy comercial (compra y venta D. productos al por mayor y menor).

El trabajo D. Lizandro es L. venta D. toda clase D. jugos D. frutas en el mercado D. ese distrito, es una persona muy conocida por los trabajadores del mercado por los ricos jugos que venD. y el carisma que tiene para vender.  También cuenta con L. ayuda económica D. su esposa, cual se dedica a L. venta D. productos D. belleza, compartiendo los gastos familiares.

Lizandro solicita un préstamo para mejorar su casa (colocar techo), por intermedio D. Edpyme  Alternativa piD. un crédito D. 2500 nuevos soles, con el único fin D. brindarles una vivienda segura a su esposa e hijo.

Lizandro es un padre D. familia responsable y muy trabajador que con ayuda D. su esposa quieren mejorar su vivienda para que se encuentren más seguros y tranquilos.
texts.en:
Lizandro is a 28-year-old father who lives with his wife and young son. They have their own home in the District of José Leonardo Ortiz. This area is known for being a commercial area where products are bought and sold in bulk and in smaller amounts.

Lizandro’s job involves selling all types of fruit juices at the district market. He is well-known among the other market workers for the tasty juices that he sells and the charisma he displays as he is making sales. His wife also supports their family financially and shares in the family expenses by selling beauty products.

Lizandro is requesting a loan to make an improvement to his house (installing a roof). For this reason, he is requesting a loan of 2500 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa so that he will have a safer home for his wife and son.

Lizandro is a responsible father and a hard worker. With the help of his wife, he will be able to improve their home so that they will have safer and more peaceful conditions.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to install a roof on his house.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: José R. A., tiene la edad de 28 años, está en unión libre  y vive con su 1 hijo y su señora que son sus mayores prioridades. El pretende comprar los insumos necesarios para su cultivo y pagar la mano de obra de la siembra del cultivo. El cuenta con la experiencia y manejo de este cultivo por lo cual invertirá en el. El quiere generar ganancias para mejorar su nivel de vida y seguir invirtiendo para seguir aumentando la producción los próximos años  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
José R. A. is 28 years old and in a common-law marriage. His wife and son are his top priorities. José intends to buy the necessary supplies for cultivating his crop as well as pay for labor. He has experience in managing his crops, so this is the reason why he wants to invest. With the earnings he will generate, José wants to improve his living standards and continue investing so that he can increase production in the years to come.

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. José has not had any previous loans with the state banks. FUDECOSUR is providing this loan with better terms and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for planting beans and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es:
María Mercedes es madre de familia de  42 años de edad con 3 hijos, vive en casa de unos familiares por que no tiene casa propia, la cual está ubicada en ciudad Eten.  Este distrito es  turístico por tener una playa bonita contar con platos típicos muy ricos para degustar y por sus costumbres ( elaboración de artesanía comosombreros y canastas) y festividades religiosas. 

La actividad que desarrolla María Mercedes es la elaboración de sombreros de junco (paja) que lo aprendio desde muy pequeña, este trabajo lo realiza con mucho gusto ya que a pasado de generación en generación en su familia.  También otra actividad que realiza es la venta de pesacado en el mercado de este distrito.

El préstamo que a solicitado María Mercedes a Edpyme Alternativa es un crédito de 800 nuevos soles para la compra de materiales para seguir elaborando sus sombreros,los cuales son de muy buena calidad, por eso tiene clientes satisfechos y así obtiene mayores ingrasos para su familia.

María Mercedes es una persona muy dedicada a su trabajo y conocida en su distrito por sus clientes satisfechos con su producto, con el objetivo de salir adelante para el bienestar de sus hijos.
texts.en:
María Mercedes is a 42-year-old mother with three children. She lives in the home of relatives in the city of Eten since she does not have a house of her own. This area is a tourist district known its beautiful beach, delicious food, local customs (such as producing handcrafted hats and baskets), and religious festivals.

María Mercedes has developed a business producing straw hats, a skill she learned as a young girl. She enjoys this type of work since it has been passed from generation to generation within her family. In addition, she sells fish at the district market.

The loan María Mercedes is requesting from Edpyme Alternativa is in the amount of 800 PEN and will be used to buy materials for making hats that are of high quality. She has satisfied customers and hopes to earn more income for her family.

María Mercedes is a person who is dedicated to her work and known for her product among her satisfied customers in the district. Her goal is to move forward for the welfare of her children.

loans.use: to purchase materials for making straw hats.

loans.name: William

texts.es: William C. Chacón, tiene la edad de 39 años, está casado  y vive con sus 4 hijos y su esposa que son sus mayores prioridades. El con el préstamo pretende realizar el arreglo del terreno para su posterior cosecha en grandes cantidades, también pagar la mano de obra de su siembra. El cuenta con el terreno apto para la explotación de este cultivo y la experiencia de varios años  en el conocimiento del cultivo. Su meta es genera ganancias para su bienestar familiar y también para seguir invirtiendo en la próximas cosechas y obtener cada día más ganancias. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
William C. Chacón is 39 years old, married, and lives with his wife and four children who are his top priorities. With this loan, he intends to prepare his land so that he can eventually harvest in large quantities. In addition, he will pay for the labor required for planting. William owns land that is suitable for growing his crop and has several years of farming experience. His goals are to generate income for the welfare of his family and to continue investing in subsequent crops so that he earn more profit each day.

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. William has not had any other loans with the state banks. FUDECOSUR is providing this loan with better terms and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for planting beans and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.es:
Verónica tiene   26 años de edad. Ella es joven y vive con su esposo y su menor hijo todos  en la casa de sus suegros. Ellos residen en la ciudad de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura al norte del Perú. Su casa esta ubicada cerca de la plaza de armas del distrito.

Su esposo se dedica a realizar  trabajos en el campo como agricultor, el también se dedica a ofrecer el servicio de  mototaxi (vehiculo de transporte público, con  moto y una cabina para el transporte de personas).

Verónica se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir y obsequios para varios eventos. Para poder desarrollar su actividad, Verónica ha instalado su negocio  en la sala de sus suegros. Ellos la apoyan brindándole ese espacio de su casa para su negocio.

Verónica tiene muchos  clientes  y cuenta con la fidelidad de muchos de ellos, su negocio es muy conocido  a solo un año de su creación .ella cuenta con una muy buena ubicación estratégica para la venta   ya que se encuentra ubicada en el centro de la cuidad.

Verónica es cliente conocida y bancarizada  de Edpyme Alternativa ya que recibió su primer crédito y lo pagó con responsabilidad. Ahora ella esta solicitando un préstamo de  S/.1400.00  para que de esta manera Verónica pueda comprar y surtir con mas mercadería, implementar e innovar su negocio con novedades en prendas de vestir y obsequios  según la estación.

Verónica tiene un espíritu emprendedor, ella quiere que sus inventarios y su  negocio crezcan. Pues ella desea  ser una empresaria de éxito pues cuenta  con  muchas cualidades de las que resaltan su puntualidad y responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Verónica is 26 years old. This young woman lives with her husband and young son in the house of her in-laws. Their home is located near the town square of their district in the city of Tambogrande, which is part of the Department of Piura in northern Peru.

Her husband works in the field as a farmer. He also offers transportation services using his motorcycle taxi (a public transportation vehicle that consists of a motorcycle with an attached cabin for transporting people).

Verónica sells clothing and gifts for different events. In order to operate her business, she set up a store in the living room of her in-laws. They have supported her by providing space in their home for her business.

Verónica has many customers and enjoys the fact that many of them have remained loyal. Her business is well-known even though it has been in existence for only one year. She has a very good strategic location for making sales since her business is in the central part of town.

Verónica is a recognized client who has banked with Edpyme Alternativa, having repaid her first loan in a responsible manner. Now she is requesting a loan of 1400 PEN so that she can purchase more merchandise to restock her store. This will refresh her business and keep it in operation since she will have novelty gifts and clothes for the new season.

Verónica has an entrepreneurial spirit, so she wants to expand her inventory and grow her business. She wants to become a successful businesswoman and has many qualities that highlight her promptness and responsibility.

loans.use: to restock her business with clothes and seasonal gifts.

loans.name: Agustin Jonathan

texts.es:
Agustín  tiene 24 años, es soltero y no tiene hijos. El vive con sus padres en casa de su familia. Su casa esta ubicada en el  la parte rural del distrito de José Leonardo Ortiz donde  cuenta solo con servicios básicos de agua y luz. José Leonardo Ortiz es un distrito de la provincia de Chiclayo al norte del Perú.

Agustín se dedica a transportar personas en un vehiculo que es de su propiedad. Este servicio lo ofrece como servicio público a su comunidad .Esta actividad  que viene realizando hace 3 años la inicio con un vehiculo alquilado .Esta actividad le permite sobrevivir y apoyar a sus padres con los gastos de su hogar.

Agustín está solicitando un préstamo de S/.500 y los necesita para el mantenimiento de su vehiculo, la herramienta de su trabajo que es con lo que sostiene a sus padres. Este mantenimiento permitirá que AGUSTIN pueda seguir desempeñándose en su oficio con normalidad sin averías, logrando obtener sus ingresos diarios habituales.

Agustín,  es un cliente nuevo para Edpyme Alternativa, no tiene créditos con ninguna institución financiera, por lo tanto se le esta bancarizando.

Agustin, es conocido en su localidad como un joven respetuoso y trabajador que le gusta apoyar a su familia y sus deseos son de darle cada una mejor calidad de vida a sus padre objetivo por el cual lucha día a día.
texts.en:
Agustín is 24 years old, single, and has no children. He lives in the home of his parents, which is located in the rural section of the District of José Leonardo Ortiz. This area receives only basic services, such as running water and electricity. The District of José Leonardo Ortiz lies in Chiclayo Province in northern Peru.

Agustín transports people using his own vehicle. He offers his services to the public within his community. Agustín has been in business for three years and started out using a rented vehicle. This business enables him to survive and help his parents with the household expenses.

Agustín is requesting a loan of 500 PEN so that he can maintain his vehicle since he uses it for work in order to support his parents. Maintaining his vehicle will allow Agustín to operate his business normally without any problems. By doing so, he will be able to generate a daily income.

Agustín is a new client to Edpyme Alternativa. He has not had any loans to deal with from other financial institutions. Agustín is known in his community as a respectful and hardworking young man. He enjoys supporting his family and wants to give his parents a better quality of life. His goal is to press forward day after day.

loans.use: to pay for vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: Jose Octavio

texts.es:
José tiene 49 años de edad, vive en el caserío La raya ubicado en el distrito de Túcume, que se encuentra a mas de una hora de distancia del distrito de Chiclayo.  Vive con su esposa e hijo en una casa propia, la cual cuenta con el servicio solo de luz por ser una comunidad en desarrollo.  El distrito es una zona turística y muy concurrida por personas de otros lugares.

José se dedica a la crianza, engorde y comercialización de aves, desde hace 20 años aproximadamente, su negocio lo tiene en la parte posterior de su casa. A sus aves las alimenta con comida balanceada y una vez que han llegado a su desarrollo las vende en el mercado del distrito de Túcume o ha otros comerciantes.

A solicitado un crédito José a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para continuar comprando aves para engordarlas y luego venderlas con la finalidad de tener mejores ingresos para poder pagar el crédito otorgado y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.

José es una persona muy conocida en su comunidad por sus ansias de superación cada día y darles una  mejor oportunidad a sus hijos en un futuro cercano.
texts.en:
José [Joseph], 49 years old, lives in a neighborhood on the edge of the Túcume provence, which is about a hours travel distance from the district of Chiclayo.

He lives with his wife and son in their own home, which only has electricity service as it is still a developing community. The district is a tourist area and very popular with people from other places.

José has worked in commercial poultry breeding, farming and selling for approximately 20 years. His business is located in the back of his home. He feeds the birds a balanced diet and once they have reached development they are sold in the Túcume district market or other markets.

José has requested a loan of 1000 soles from Edpyme Alternative to purchase birds to raise and sell in order to earn more to improve the quality of life for his family and repay the loan.

José is a well-known in his community due to his desire to excel every day and give better opportunities to his children in the near future.

loans.use: to buy food and birds to raise for poultry

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Luís es un cliente de 47 años de edad y es soltero. Luis tiene dos hijos menores de edad pero no viven con el. Luis vive en Chacupe bajo, donde lamentablemente no cuentan con los servicios básicos (energía eléctrica, ni agua)  y esta ubicado en el distrito de La Victoria  en la provincia de Chiclayo, al norte del Perú.

Luis se dedica a trabajar como peón en la agricultura y también  realiza  sombríos de tubérculos y verduras. El  tiene mas de 10 años de experiencia en este oficio, pues desde muy joven se dedicó a esta labor y ahora, solventa sus gastos diarios con el fruto de esta actividad.

Luis esta solicitando a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de S/. 3000 para que el pueda comprar 01 una moto bomba (especie de maquinaria que realiza riegos de agua en grandes cantidades) para regar sus cultivos y de esta manera el pueda cumplir con mayor eficiencia sus metas de producción. Luís podrá producir en grandes cantidades y abastecer a un mercado mas grande.

Luis es una persona constante que quiere progresar y tener una mejor calidad de vida, por lo que el necesita esta herramienta de trabajo para facilitar su actividad. Luis es una persona entusiasta que espera cumplir sus metas con responsabilidad y trabajo.
texts.en:
Luís is a 47 year old client and he is single. He has two minor children but they don't live with him. Luis lives in Chacupe Bajo, where unfortunately they don't have basic services (electricity or water). It is located in the district of La Victoria in the province of Chiclayo, in northern Peru.

Luis works as a farm laborer and he also grows tubers and vegetables. He has more than 10 years experience in this trade, since since he was very young he has done this work and now he pays his daily expenses with the what he makes from this work.   

Luis is asking  Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of  S/. 3000 so that he can buy one mechanical pump (a type of machinery that irrigates water in large quantities) in order to irrigate his crops and in this way achieve his production goals more efficiently. Luís will be able to produce large quantities and supply a larger market.  

Luis is a reliable person who wants to progress and have a better quality of life. That is why h he needs this work tool to facilitate his activity. Luis is an enthusiastic person who hopes to meet his goals of responsibility and work.

loans.use: to buy a mechanical pump (a tool that will serve to extract water to irrigate his crops)

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es:
José es un padre de familia de 55 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en una cas propia en el distrito de Cayaltí, que se encuentra a mas de una hora de distancia del distrito de Chiclayo.   Es un  distrito que se caracteriza por que sus pobladores se dedican a la  actividad agricola y ganadera.

José se dedica hace más de 10 años a las labores agricolas junto con sus hijos quienes le ayudan para que el trabajo sea menos pesado, en sus chacaras o tierras cultiva frejol que es un alimento sano y rico para el consumo diario de los pobladores.

José  a solicitado un préstamo  de 3000 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para lacompra de úrea paramejorar sus tierras y tenga una mejor cosecha de frejol, también para pagos de jornales de trabajadores que lo ayudan en el cultivo de frejol.

En Cayaltí José es conocido por el buen trato que da ha sus trabajadores que lo ayudan en las actividades agrícolas, es responsable y  trabajador.  Todas esas mejoras que tiene es solo para tener mejores ingresos econónicos y poder cubrir las necesidades de su familia.
texts.en:
José is a 55 year old husband and father. He lives with his wife and children in their own home in the district of  Cayaltí, located an hour from the district of Chiclayo. It's a district characterized by the inhabitant's agricultural and ranching work.

José has spent more than 10 years doing farm work with his children, who help with the lighter work in his fields and bean fields, a healthy and delicious food for the residents' daily consumption.  

José has asked for a loan of 3000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa  to buy for urea to improve his land and have a better bean crop. He also needs to pay his laborers who help harvest the beans. 

In Cayaltí, José is known for treating his workers well, which has helped him in his farm work. He is responsible and hard working. All of of these inprovements are to have more income and be able to pay for his family's needs.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to improve his crop land and to pay his workers.

loans.name: Raquel

texts.en:
Raquel is 33 years old and married with three children, and one child is in school. Raquel works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, soap, etc. in her variety store.

Raquel has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap, and other grocery items. 

In the future Raquel would like to save enough money so she can send all her children to school.

loans.use: To buy items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Emelia

texts.en:
Emelia is 49 years old and married with three children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a ready-to-wear business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock to sell like curtains, pants, shirts, etc.

Emelia has taken out and repaid 17 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the ready-to-wear business for seven years and also earns income from transportation (tricycle--a three-wheeled transport vehicle).

Emelia aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional stock to sell.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
