La socia está muy agradecido por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de dicho préstamo de forma disciplinada.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the communal bank "Ollantay de Wayrapuncu," which is located in the province of Ollantaytambo and the department of Cusco.

She is Sra. Soila. She is a widow. She is 71 years old and has 6 children, all of them independent. She has her grocery store; with each loan she stocks her store. She needs to buy beverages, rice, sugar, crackers, and milk, and items of this sort to stock the grocery store. She will buy the products mentioned for this new season. She is applying for the loan to invest in setting up her grocery store.

This communal bank member is very grateful for the loan and promises to make all the loan payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: in invest in stocking her grocery store.

loans.name: Felicita

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN INMACULADA CONCEPCION-ANTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Felicitas; ella tiene 36 años de edad y es casada y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de granos secos, ella vende trigo, cebada, maíz y moraya, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de granos secos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar granos secos al por mayor.                     
                          
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Immaculate Virgin of Conception-Anta” cooperative bank located in the Anta district of the department of Cusco.  

Her name is Felicitas; she is 36 years old, married and has 1 child.  She alternates her daily activities with a business selling dry goods such as wheat, barley, corn and dehydrated potato.  Through this business, she has been able to help her family get ahead.  She would like to expand her dry goods enterprise and requests this loan to buy products at wholesale.

She is very happy for the access to credit, and commits to making her payments.

loans.use: buy products such as wheat, barley and corn at wholesale.

loans.name: Ercelia

texts.es: Ercelia, natural del distrito de Palmapampa, tiene 44 años, es una mujer laboriosa, y esta casada con Juan de 46 años y fruto de su amor concibieron 03 hijos y juntos vive en su propia casa en la comunidad de Canal caserío del distrito de Samugari. El trabajo que realiza Ercelia es labrar la tierra donde cultiva cacao, café y frutas cítricas, esta labor la realiza junto a su esposo, quien también trabaja arduamente para obtener ingresos para su familia. Ella ha visto por conveniente llevar sus productos hasta la ciudad de San Francisco, ya que según manifiesta, es ahí donde mejores precios obtiene por sus productos. Cuando su trabajo se le acumula no duda en contratar jornaleros para que tenga mayor avance en cuanto a su labor. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos de la plaga que amenazan su productividad. Lleva 20 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos, ya que el camino es muy largo y agotador desde su chacra hasta su comunidad ya que es allí donde realiza el secado respectivo de sus productos. Más adelante espera comprar nuevas tierras para incrementar sus cultivos. Este es su tercer  crédito con MFP y espera ser muy puntual en sus cuotas, puesto que no quiere darle problemas a su banco comunal, en el cual se siente muy contenta. Con el crédito solicitado comprará, sacos de abono y fertilizantes, con lo cual espera mejorar sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Ercelia, a native of the Palmapampa district, is 44 years old and a hard-working woman.  She is married to Juan, 46, and their union has yielded 3 children.  They live in their own home in the Canal community, part of the Samugari district.  Ercelia’s work involves tending to land where she grows cacao, coffee and citrus.  She does her work at the side her husband, who also works hard to generate income for the family.

She has found it convenient to take her products to the city of San Francisco where, as she tells us, she can get better prices for her goods.  When her workload increases, she has no problem finding migrant laborers to help her out.  What she enjoys most about her work is protecting the crops against plagues that threaten productivity.

She has been in farming for 20 years, and finds the most difficult aspect to be transporting her products.  The trip from her farm to her community is long and tiring, but this is where the drying of her respective products takes place.  In the future, she would like to buy additional lands in order to increase productivity.

This is her third loan with MFP.  She hopes to be very punctual with her payments since she doesn’t want to create any problems for her cooperative bank.  She will use the requested loan to buy sacks of fertilizers to improve her crops.

loans.use: buy sacks of fertilizers for her crops.

loans.name: Nieves Liliana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “OLLANTAY DE WAYRACPUNCU”; Este banco está ubicado en la Provincia de Ollantaytambo  y  departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Nieves; es conviviente; La socia tiene 29 años de edad; ella tiene 1 hijo de 6 años de edad, la socia tiene su tienda de abarrotes, la socia tiene la tienda en su casa en la planta baja y ella misma administra su tienda y todo lo que tiene invierte en la implementación de su negocio ella se abastece cada vez que puede para seguir teniendo a sus clientes felices, la socia ahora desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de aceite, sal, arroz, la socia desea invertir el préstamo en la implementación de sus tienda.

La socia está muy agradecido por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de dicho préstamo de forma disciplinada.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “OLLANTAY DE WAYRACPUNCU” cooperative bank.  This bank is located in the Ollantaytambo province in the department of Cusco.

Her name is Mrs. Nieves and she is in a common-law marriage.  She is 29 years old and has one 6-year old child.  She has a general store on the bottom floor of her home.  She herself manages it, and reinvests everything she has into expanding the business.  She supplies it every time she can in order to keep her customers happy.  She now wants to invest the loan into the purchase of cooking oil, salt and rice.  She wants to invest the credit into supplying the store.

She is very thankful for the loan, and commits to making the payments for said credit in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: buy cooking oil, salt and rice to supply her store.

loans.name: Ana Obdulia

texts.es:
Ana, reside en San Carlos, departamento de Morazán, se dedica a la venta de tamales, pan y ropa, vive junto a su esposo y dos hijos. Ella se dedica a la venta de pan dulce, también tamales y ropa de vestir de forma ambulante.
Por el momento necesita invertir en el negocio, comprando harina, huevos, azúcar, también pollo y algunas prendas de vestir. Con esta inversión podrá aumentar la mercadería y ofrecer a los clientes una mayor producción en pan y tamales, así también nuevas prendas de vestir con diferentes estilos.
Su objetivo primordial es mejorar su vivienda, para que sus hijos estén más seguros y cómodos, también que estos estudien y puedan superarse.
texts.en:
Ana lives in San Carlos, located in the department of Morazán.  She dedicates herself to selling tamales, bread, and clothing.  She lives with her husband and two children.  She is a street vendor of items such as tamales, sweet bread and clothing.

At the moment, she needs to invest in her business by buying flour, eggs, sugar, chicken and also some clothing.  With this investment, she will be able to augment her merchandise and offer her customers more bread and tamales.  In addition, she wants to offer them a greater variety of clothing styles.

Her main objective is to make improvements to her home, so that her children can live more securely and comfortably.  Also, she wants them to get educations so they can succeed.

loans.use: buy flour, eggs, sugar, chicken and also some clothing.

loans.name: Gloria Del Carmen

texts.es:
Gloria, reside en San Francisco Gotera, departamento de Morazán, vive con sus tres hijos, se dedica a la venta de refrescos de horchata, su puesto está ubicado en el mercado municipal de san Francisco Gotera.
Solicita un préstamo para comprar ajonjolí,  morro, maní y azúcar, para preparar los refrescos, esta será una gran ayuda para ella y fortalecer el negocio, con suficiente material para preparar los productos.
Su objetivo es ayudar a sus hijos, mejorar su vivienda y fortalecer el negocio.
texts.en:
Gloria lives in San Francisco Gotera, located in the department of Morazán.  She lives with her three children, and dedicates herself to selling horchata (a milky, rice-based drink flavored with sugar and spices).  Her stall is located in the municipal market of San Francisco Gotera.

She requests a loan to buy sesame seeds, morro, peanuts, and sugar to make her refreshments.  This would help her a great deal in strengthening the business with enough supplies to make her product.

Her objectives are to help her children, improve her home, and strengthen her business.

loans.use: buy sesame seeds, morro, peanuts and sugar for making her beverages.

loans.name: Ernestina

texts.es: Ernestina, natural de la ciudad de San Miguel; de 48 años es una mujer alegre y laboriosa, esta casada con Emiliano de 50 años y fruto de esa relación tienen 05 hijos y juntos viven en su propia casa en la comunidad de canal anexo del distrito Palmapampa. Ernestina, empezó su aventura como agricultora desde muy niña en las tierras de sus padres. Su pasión  por el agro lo llevo a adquirir sus propias tierras, que fueron comprados con el esfuerzo de ella y de su esposo. Ha trabajado durante 23 años en su propia parcela; en la cual cultiva plantas de cacao y café. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de los jornaleros quienes se encargan de extraer con mayor rapidez los frutos de cada producto y de esa manera logra avanzar con mayor celeridad en cuanto a su trabajo. Se siente muy comprometida con su labor; porque gracias a su esfuerzo cotidiano hoy disfruta al ver que los frutos de sus plantas le resultan, así obteniendo buenas ganancias por cada kilogramo de producto vendido. Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es comprar nuevas tierras para expandir sus sembríos y aumentar su producción. Este es su séptimo crédito con MFP, esta dispuesta a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, ya que desea acceder a otro crédito más adelante. En su banco comunal es una socia muy respetada por poner orden al grupo. El crédito solicitado es para la adquisición de plantas de cacao para luego injertarlos y sacar buen provecho de sus frutos en menor tiempo.
texts.en:
Ernestina is from the city of San Miguel.  She is 48 years old, and she is a happy and hard-working woman.  She is married to 50 year old Emiliano, and they have five children.  They live together in their own house in the Canal community, and annex of the Palmapampa district.

Ernestina started her adventure as a farmer on her parents’ fields when she was a very young girl.  Her passion for farming led her to acquire her own fields.  Her fields were purchased through her efforts as well as her husband's.  

She has worked her own land for 23 years.  She grows cacao and coffee.  At harvest time she has help from the day workers who take charge of gathering the fruits of each product more quickly.  This way she manages to complete her work at a more rapid pace. 

She is very committed to her business. Thanks to her daily effort she now enjoys watching the products her plants yield, earning better profits for each kilogram that is sold. 

For now her greatest priority is to buy new land to expand her crops and increase her production.

This is her 7th loan with MFP, and she is prepared to make her payments on time as she wishes to access future loans.  She is much respected in her communal bank because she keeps the group in order.

She will use the requested loan to get cacao plants.  She will then graft them, and she will get good profit from their fruits in less time.

loans.use: to buy cacao plants.

loans.name: Paula

texts.es:
Paula es una madre de familia  de 46 años de edad vive con su hijo en su casa ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Pimentel.  Se cacteriza por ser un balneario muy concurrido por los pobladores del distrito de Chiclayo,por encontrarse a 15 minutos de distancia especialmente en la época de verano para disfrutar de su playa y ricos potajes (comidas).

Paula se dedica hace más de 10 años a la compra, crianza y venta de aves de corral como gallinas,pavos,patos y gallos al por menor.   Los cría en su corral que se encuentra en la parte posterior de su casa para mayor seguridad de sus animales, los alimenta con comidad balanceada  y lo mas natural posible.  Una vez que han completado su desarrollo los vende a los distintos restaurantes del distrito de Pimentel como el mercado de sitio.

Para poder incrementar sus ventas Paula necesita un préstamo de 2200 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para seguir comprando aves de corral y seguir incrmentando sus ventas e ingresos para su casa, cubriendo sus necesidades diarias.

Paula es una mujer responsble, trabajadora y empeñosa conocida por los pobladores del distrito de Pimentel, por querer mejorar  económicamente y cumplir el sueño que se ha trazado, el poderle dar una profesión a su hijo en un futuro cercano.
texts.en:
Paula, age 46, lives with her son.  Her house is in the rural zone of the Pimentel district.  The area is characterized as being a very popular resort with the residents of the Chiclayo district, which is 15 minutes away.  It is especially crowded during the summer when people enjoy its beach and delicious food.

For over ten years Paula has devoted herself to buying, raising, and selling wholesale poultry like chickens, turkeys, and ducks at retail prices.  For greater security, she raises them in the yard behind her house.  She feeds them balanced feed and the most natural feed as possible.  Once they have grown, she sells them to different restaurants such as the market in the Pimentel district. 

In order to be able to increase her sales, Paula needs a loan for 2,200 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  She needs to continue buying poultry, to continue increasing her sales and income for her house, and to continue covering the daily necessities.

Paula is a very responsible, hard-working, and tenacious woman.  She is well-known by the residents of the Pimentel district.   She wants to improve financially and to fulfill the dream she has planned.  Her dream is to give her son a profession in the near future.

loans.use: to buy poultry.

loans.name: Irma

texts.es: Irma, natural de la ciudad de San Miguel de 21 años, es una mujer alegre y trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Fraxides de 22 años y su querido hijo Henri de 05 años de edad, a quien desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Los arduos trabajos que realiza Irma junto a su pareja en su chacra, han hecho que sus cultivos estén muy bien cuidados y que los días de venta sus productos sean rápidamente comprados. Su principal fuente de ingresos, es la venta de cacao, café, plátano y plantas de barbasco, las cuales vende en la ciudad de San Francisco. Irma en tiempos de cosecha contrata jornaleros y de esa manera avanza con mayor celeridad en las extracciones de sus frutos. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar sus tierras, ya que siente que su trabajo está dando sus frutos,  lleva 06 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es cuidar sus cultivos de la  plaga de insectos que atacan sus plantas. Con el tiempo desea adquirir nuevas tierras, para ampliar sus cultivos. Es su quinto crédito con MFP, ha sido muy puntual en sus pagos y sin causar problemas a su banco comunal. Con el crédito solicitado comprará insecticidas para combatir la plaga de insectos.
texts.en:
Irma is from the city of San Miguel.  She is 21 years old, and she is a happy and hard-working woman.  She lives in her own house with her 22 year old life partner, Fraxides, and her beloved five year old son, Henria.  She wishes to give him a better quality of life.

The arduous work that Irma does with Fraxides on her farm has made their crops well cared.  Therefore, her products are rapidly purchased on sale day.  Her main source of income is selling cacao, coffee, bananas, and mullein.  She sells her products in San Francisco.

At harvest time Irma hires day workers so that the products can be harvested more quickly.  What she likes the most about her work is harvesting her land because she feels that she is getting the fruit of her work.  She has been doing this for six years.  The most difficult part is taking care so the pest infestations do not attack the plants.  In time she wants to get more land to increase her crops.

This is her fifth loan with MFP.  She has been very punctual with her payments, and she has not caused any problems for her communal bank.  She will use the requested loan to buy insecticides to combat pest infestations.

loans.use: to buy insecticides.

loans.name: Jose Adan

texts.es:
José, reside en Meanguera, departamento de Morazán, es agricultor, vive con su esposa Y su hijo, ellos se dedican a la agricultura y crianza de aves de corral, cerdos y ganado, él por su parte cultiva maíz, frijol y maicillo.
Actualmente necesita un préstamo para comprar los insumos agrícolas, abono y fertilizantes, ya que se dispone a sembrar maíz y debe contratar mozos para que le ayuden a realizar la siembra.
Sus sueños es crecer su hijo, dar una buena alimentación y educación, por tal razón se esfuerza día con día para trabajar y ofrecer a su familia lo necesario.
texts.en:
José lives in Meanguera, in Morazán department.  He is a farmer and lives with his wife Vilma and his son.  They farm crops and raise poultry, pigs and cattle.  José grows corn, beans and sorghum.

José currently needs a loan to buy agricultural supplies, manure and fertilizers since he is ready to sow his corn and he needs to hire laborers to help him carry out his sowing.

José's dreams are to raise his child, and feed and educate him well.  For this reason, he strives every day to work and offer his family what they need.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies, manure and fertilizers

loans.name: Maguette

texts.fr:
MONSIEUR MAGUETTE EST ENSEIGNANT EN ARABE DE PROFESSION.PARALLÈLEMENT A SON ACTIVITÉ IL FAIT AUSSI DU SERVICE 
(salle de jeu a Pikine dans la région de Dakar).
il sollicite ce prêt pour augmenter son matériel d'exploitation et éventuellement sa marge bénéficiaire.
texts.en: Mr. MAGUETTE is a teacher of Arabic. He also has a business. He provides a service (a games arcade in Pikine, in the region of Dakar). He is requesting this loan to augment his supplies and equipment and probably his profit margin.

loans.use: to bolster his supplies and equipment for work

loans.name: Leon

texts.es: León tiene 28 años, es un joven muy trabajador, vive en su propia casa, construido a base de material rustico, ubicado en la comunidad de Canal anexo del distrito de Palmapampa. León es un joven centrado en sus responsabilices y trabaja con mucho esmero para sobresalir adelante con sus plantas de cacao, café y plantas de achiote, los cuales después de cosecharlos los lleva a vender a la ciudad de San Francisco, en donde ya tiene diversos compradores, que sabiendo de la calidad de su producto no dudan en esperarlo para comprarle todos sus cultivos al por mayor. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y hacerlas fértiles y productivas, lleva  05 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es fumigar sus chacras debido a la plaga de insectos, ya que tiene que hacerlo con mucho cuidado sin causar daño a su salud. En adelante, espera seguir ahorrando sus ingresos ya que desea comprar nuevas tierras. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, sabe que este aporte le será muy beneficioso para el desarrollo de su trabajo. Se siente contento por pertenecer al grupo de socios de su banco comunal. Con el crédito solicitado es para el mantenimiento de sus cultivos como: la poda, el desmonte y la fumigación.
texts.en: León is 28 years old.  He is a very hard-working young man.  He lives in his own house, built from rustic materials and located in the Canal community in the Palmapampa district.  León is a young man focused on his responsibilities, and he works with great care to excel and move forward with his cacao, coffee, and achiote plants.  After he harvests them, he brings them to sell in the city of San Francisco, where he already has various buyers who know the quality of his products and don't hesitate to wait for him in order to buy all of his crops at wholesale.  What he likes most about his work is planting his land and making it fertile and productive.  He has been doing this work for 5 years, and he thinks the most difficult thing is fumigating his fields due to the plague of insects, since he has to do it very carefully without damaging his health.  In the future, he hopes to continue saving his earnings, since he would like to buy more land.  This is his second credit with MFP.  He knows that this loan will be very beneficial for the development of his work.  He is happy to be a member of his communal bank.  He will use the loan for crop maintenance such as trimming, clearing, and fumigation.

loans.use: to hire day workers to trim, clean and remove the underbrush in his fields.

loans.name: María Luisa

texts.es:
María, resiD. en San Francisco Gotera, departamento D. Morazán, se dedica a atender una tienda D. productos domésticos, vive con su esposo quien trabaja D. repartidor D. gaseosas, juntos ven la manera D. proveer ingresos y ayudar a sus hijos.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra D. productos comestibles como, pan, galletas, sodas, jugos, pastas, embutidos y huevos, esta compra será una gran ayuda para surtir el negocio y generar más ingresos.
Los sueños y aspiraciones D. María son crecer a sus hijos y que estudien, además D. tener un negocio que cada día sea más rentable.
texts.en:
María resides in San Francisco Gotera, a department of Morazán.  She tends a household products store.  María lives with her husband, a soft drink delivery man.  Together they proviD. earnings and help their children.

She is asking for a loan to buy edible products like bread, cookies, sodas, juices, pastas, sausages and eggs.  This purchase will be a big help in stocking up the business and generating more earnings.

María’s dreams and aspirations are to raise her children and that they study, in addition to having a business that every day becomes more profitable.

loans.use: purchase bread, cookies, soadas, juices, pastas, sausages and eggs.

loans.name: Leonora

texts.es: Leonora tiene 34 años, es una mujer activa y trabajadora, vive en su propia vivienda junto a su pareja Filomeno de 36 años y sus 02 queridos hijos Nancy de 11 años y Maykol de 08 años de edad a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. La actividad a la que se dedica Leonora, es el cultivo café, cacao y palillo sobre tierras que compró con sus esfuerzos. Ella labra sus tierras con el apoyo de su pareja y de los jornaleros quienes le brindan el apoyo, asimismo le ayudan a sacar la maleza de sus campos, así como se dedican a cosechar y trasladar los productos recolectados hasta las carreteras para luego ser llevados para su comercialización. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es la libertad que tiene en el desempeño de su labor, ya que ella decide que es mejor para sus cultivos, lleva 15 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es combatir con la plaga de insectos que se apoderan de los brotes de sus cultivos. Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es comprar nuevas tierras para incrementar. Este es su noveno crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que ser puntual en sus pagos, si desea acceder a otro crédito posteriormente. Se siente muy contenta por ser socia de su banco comunal y aporta de si misma por el desarrollo de su grupo. Con el crédito solicitado comprará semillas de cacao y café.
texts.en:
Leonora is 34 years old and a very active, hard working woman.  She lives in her own home with her partner Filomeno, 36, and their two beloved children: Nancy, 11, and Maykol, 8.  They want to provide the children with a better quality of life.  

With much effort, Leonora bought land to cultivate coffee, cacao and make toothpicks.  She works her land with her partner’s help, and with the field workers who provide support.  They also help weed the land and gather harvests to the roads, so that they can then take them to market.  

Leonora has done this for fifteen years.  What she likes most about her work is the liberty that she has over the use of her labor, since she decides what is best for her crops.  What she considers most difficult is fighting the plague of insects that take over crop shoots.  But today, Leonora’s main priority is to buy new land so that she can expand.

This is her ninth loan with MFP.  She knows that she needs to be punctual in her payments and wants to access a subsequent loan.  She is very happy to be a part of her communal bank and contributes to the development of the group.  With the loan, she will purchase cacao and coffee seeds.

loans.use: buy cacao and coffee seeds.

loans.name: Arboleda Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama "Arboleda"; esta ubicado en los alrededores en el estado de Puebla. Este grupo esta conformado por 12 Integrantes y es el cuarto prestamo que solicitan, siempre pagando puntual. La señora Ofelia V. es la Presidenta del Grupo, ella tiene una experiencia amplia en la produccion de diversos tipos de legumbres, ya que lleva 17 años realizando este oficio; estudio hasta la Primaria; tiene dos hijos varones, uno de 12 años y otro de 14 años. Su esposo se dedica al campo. La Señora Ofelia solicita elprestamo para seguir invirtiendo en la producción de legumbres como: chicharos, zanahorias, elotes, chayote, y tener cada vez mayor producción y llegar a más gente que se puedan alimentar sano y sin conservadores. Para poder tener una mejorcalidad de vida y darle a sus hijos lo que ella no pudo tener, brindandoles estudios, la señora esta agradecida con el prestamo ya que gracias a ello ha logrado salir adelante con esta oportunidad que se le dan a las mujeres emprendedoras. Observaciones, la señora que no se ve bien se llama Libia P.
texts.en:
This group is called "Arboleda" and is located on the outskirts of the State of Puebla.  The group has 12 members and this is the fourth loan that they have requested.  They have always made their repayments punctually.

Ofelia V. is the group's president.  She has a lot of experience in producing different types of vegetables since she has been in this business for 17 years.  She attended elementary school and has two sons: one is 12 years old and the other is 14.  Her husband farms.

Ofelia is requesting this loan so that she can continue investing in producing vegetables such as peas, carrots, corn and chayotes (vegetable pears), and increase her production so that she can reach more people and enable them to eat healthily and without preservatives.  She would also like to enjoy a better quality of life and to provide her children with an education, which she was not able to have herself.

Ofelia is grateful for her loan since it has meant that she has managed to get ahead through this opportunity that is being given to entrepreneurial women.

(Note: the lady who cannot be seen very well is called Libia P.).

loans.use: to continue to invest in producing vegetables

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cloth, zippers, thread, and other sewing supplies for making dresses and pants.

loans.name: Marcelo

texts.es: Marcelo, de 45 años, natural del distrito de Samugari departamento de Ayacucho, convive con  Sonia de 39 años padres de 04 hijos, quienes son la felicidad de su hogar y viven en su propia casa en la comunidad de Canal. Marcelo, es un hombre de mucho provecho, se dedica con mucho esmero a la labor que realiza. Su trabajo es labrar la tierra es campesino y cuenta con 06 hectáreas de terreno, cultivados con plantas de cacao, barbasco y hojas de coca. Ha trabajado durante 20 años y es conocedor del arduo trabajo en el agro; pero en tiempos de cosecha busca el apoyo de los jornaleros para que la apoyen en las extracciones de los frutos; sus plantas más rentables son los granos de cacao y hojas de coca, por lo cual las empresas acopiadoras de cuyos productos le remuneran muy bien por cada kilogramo. El problema de su trabajo radica en no poder combatir con los insectos quienes se encargan de dañar los frutos de las plantas. Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es comprar nuevas tierras para expandir sus sembríos y aumentar su producción. Este es su octavo crédito con MFP está dispuesto a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, ya que desea acceder a otro crédito más adelante. En su banco comunal es un socio muy participe. Con el crédito solicitado es para la adquisición de más plantones de cacao para luego injertarlos y sacar buen provecho de sus frutos en menor tiempo.
texts.en:
Marcelo is 45 years old and is a native of the Samugari district in the department of Ayacucho.  He lives with Sonia, who is 39 years old, and together they have 4 children, who are the happiness of their home.  The own their own home in the community of Canal.  Marcelo is a productive member of society and takes great care in his job.  He is a farmer and has 6 hectares of land where he grows cocoa, barbasco (an inedible wild yam) and coca leaves.  He has worked for 20 years and is no stranger to arduous, farm work.  At harvest time however, he seeks the help of laborers to pick the fruit.  Cocoa beans and coca leaves are the most profitable because the companies that act as middlemen for his products pay him very well for each kilogram.  One problem he faces is not being able to combat the insects that damage the fruits of his plants.  His highest priority right now is to purchase more land so that he can expand his planting and increase production.  

This is his eighth loan with MFP and he is prepared to make all of his payments on time, since he would like to be able to access more credit in the future.  He is a very involved member of his communal bank.  With the loan he is requesting he will buy more cocoa seedlings to graft and thereby, make the most  of his fruit in less time.

loans.use: to purchase cocoa plants.

loans.name: Pasha

texts.ru: Pasha A. rodilsya v 1969 qodu. Pasha uje 12 let kak zanimayetsya skotovodstvom i razvodit korov. On yavlyayetsya IDP personom, pereselenec iz Fuzuli qoroda, seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione vmeste so svoyey drujelubnoy semyoy. On jenat i imeyet 2 detey kotoriye uchatsya v shkole. Seychas Pasha nujdayetsya v 2300 AZN chtobi kupit korov dlya uvelicheniya molochnoqo produkta dlya prodaji v magazini.
texts.en: Pasha A. was born in 1969. Pasha has been a herdsman for twelve years, raising cows.  He is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person).  He is a refugee from Fuzuli city who now lives with his close-knit family in the Fuzuli region.  He is married and has two children who go to school.  Now, Pasha needs 2300 AZN to buy cows to increase production of the milk he sells in stores.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to invest in merchandise for her snack business.

loans.name: Cristino

texts.es:
Cristino, reside en Cacaopera, departamento de Morazán, se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, vive con su esposa y su hijo de un año de edad, él tiene cinco años de dedicarse al negocio, su esposa es la que mayormente está pendiente del negocio, una de sus ventajas es que no tiene otro negocio cerca que le haga la competencia.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la reparación de un vehículo que es en el que transporta las verduras desde el mercado hacia su puesto de venta, este préstamo le ayudara a tener en buenas condiciones el carro y continuar transportando su mercadería.
Su visión es crecer en el negocio y así tener una mayor oportunidad de ofrecer a su familia una mejor condición de vida.
texts.en:
Cristino, who lives in Cacaopera, Morazán Department, makes his living selling fruits and vegetables.  He lives with his wife and their one-year old son.  He has had his business for five years, and it is mainly his wife who runs the business.  One of their advantages is that there is no nearby business to compete with them.
He is currently requesting a loan to repair the vehicle used to transport their produce from the market their sales stall.  This loan with help him to keep the car in good condition and to continue transporting his merchandise.
His vision is to grow the business and thereby have a greater opportunity to offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to repair the vehicle that he uses to transport his vegetables.

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.es:
Adelaida una madre de familia de 38 años de edad, vive con sus 3 hijos y su esposo en una casa propia de material rústico en una comunidad llamada Saqa, la cual pertenece al distrito de Zaña  y se encuentra a una distancia de  poco más de una hora de la distrito de Chiclayo.  Zaña es un lugar que llama mucho la atención por su atractivo turístico y por ser una zona dedicada a la agricultura y ganadería.

Desde unos 10 años aproximadamente Adelaida se ha dedicado a la venta de abarrotes (productos que se utilizan diariamente como: leche, arroz, aciete, azúcar, papel higiénico, atún, huevos,etc.), su negocio lo ha colocado en su misma casa para su comodidad y seguridad.  Con las ganacias porlaventadesusproductos  trata de cubrir  todos sus gastos y mejorar su nivel de vida.

Para poder  comprar mas mercadeía a solicitado uncrédito a Edpyme Alternativa  de 2000 nuevos soles,con el único ideal de que su negocio cresca;  mejorando sus ingrasos podrá cubrir todas sus necesides,cumpliendotambien conlospagos mensuales de su crédito.

Adelaida es una madre responsable, dedicada y trbajadora que se preocupa por que sus hijos sean cada vez mejor y ayudarlos a que cumplan sus sueños mas adelante y en un futuro tener un negocio mas grande.
texts.en:
Adelaida is a 38-year-old mother who lives with her three children and husband in their own home, made piecemeal out of rudimentary materials, in a community called Saqa, in the district of Zaña and a little more than an hour's distance from the Chiclayo district. Zaña is quite an attention-getting place due to its high tourist appeal as well as its tradition of livestock farming and agriculture. 

Approximately ten years ago Adelaida began earning a living selling groceries (products for daily consumption such as milk, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, tuna fish, eggs, etc.) She established her business in her own home for the sake of convenience and safety. With her profits from the sales she tries to cover all her costs and improve her standard of living. 

In order to purchase more merchandise she has requested a loan of 2,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternative, with the sole aim that her business grow. By increasing her income she will be able to cover all her needs, as well as make the monthly payments on her loan. 

Adelaida is a responsible mother, dedicated and hardworking, who wants to do right by her children all the time and help them fulfill their own dreams down the road. She also wishes to have a larger business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Juan Santos

texts.es:
Juan, es agricultor, vive acompañado de su esposa y tres hijos de 16, 14 y 12 años de edad, residen en San Rafael Oriente departamento de San Miguel, tiene 20 años de dedicarse al negocio y lo hace todos los días de 6:00am a 3:00pm, pero sobre todo cuando está sembrando.
Actualmente necesita un préstamo para la compra de abono, tratamiento de plagas y otros que son necesarios para realizar el cultivo, esta compra le ayudara a contar con los insumos necesarios e ir preparando la tierra con tiempo.
Su objetivo es tener una buena cosecha de maíz y frijol, con esta producción ayudar a su familia para salir adelante con ellos.
texts.en:
Juan is a farmer and lives with his wife and three children who are 16, 14 and 12 years old. They live in San Rafael Oriente in the region of San Miguel. He has worked in this business for 20 years and he works every day from 6:00 am until 3:00 pm, especially when planting. He currently needs a loan to buy fertilizer and pesticides and other chemicals for his crops. This will help him have enough fertilizer and keep on schedule when preparing his land.

His goal is to have a good corn and bean harvest and help his family get ahead.

loans.use: buy fertilizer and herbicide

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Lucinda Esperanza

texts.es:
Lucinda tiene 30 años de edad y vive con su esposo con el que tiene un lindo hijo de 10 años que estudia en una escuela estatal. Esta familia vive en una pequeña casa hecha de material  rústico (esteras, adobe) que se encuentra dentro del  asentamiento humano Madre de Dios (en el Perú es muy común que un conjunto de personas de clase muy baja se reúnan y empiecen a construir sus propias casas de materiales de baja calidad en terrenos vacíos y a esta comunidad se les denomina asentamiento humano ó pueblo joven) en el distrito de Guadalupe  ubicado en la provincia Pacasmayo, La Libertad – Perú.

En el asentamiento humano Madre de Dios predomina la actividad rural y Lucinda se dedica a la crianza de aves de corral los cuales  vende  a restaurantes cercanos a su domicilio.

Lucinda solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1200 nuevos soles el cual invertirá en la compra de nuevas aves de corral como patos y gallinas para extender sus ventas a distintos restaurantes, no sólo a los cercanos a su domicilio. 

Lucinda tiene mucha confianza en que con el dinero podrá cumplir su meta, ya que ella tiene muy buena reputación respecto a la crianza de animales y en su pueblo es conocida como la señora que vende las aves a muy buenos precios.

Lucinda espera obtener este préstamo para poder realizar el negocio expuesto y así poder tener mayores ingresos para terminar de construir su casa de manera adecuada y darle mayores comodidades a su pequeño hijo.
texts.en:
Lucinda is 30 years old and lives with her husband and their sweet 10-year-old son who studies at the state school. This family lives in a small house made of rustic materials (straw and adobe) in the settlement of Madre de Dios (in Peru it is very common for people of the lower class to join together and begin building their own homes of lower-quality materials on empty land and then calling the communities settlements or young villages) in the district of Guadalupe located in the province of Pacasmayo, La Libertad, Peru.

In the settlement of Madre de Dios, agriculture is the predominant activity, and Lucinda works raising poultry that she then sells to restaurants near her home. Lucinda is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1,200 nuevos soles to buy new birds, like ducks and chickens, to be able to sell to other restaurants, and not only those near her home.

Lucinda trusts that the money will help her meet her goal, as she already has a very good reputation with regards to raising animals and is known in her village as the lady who sells birds for very good prices. Lucinda hopes to get a loan to help with her business and to have increased earnings to finish building her house and provide greater comfort for her young son.

loans.use: buy ducks and chickens to raise and sell

loans.name: Adelio

texts.es:
Adelio, es agricultor, vive con su esposa y una hija de 8 años de edad, ellos residen en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, tiene 15 años de trabajar en la tierra, aprendió de su padre y está dedicado todos los días de la semana para atender lo que demande la agricultura de 6:00am a 4:00pm.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de abono y fertilizantes ya que se dispone a iniciar la siembra de maíz y frijol, este préstamo le ayudara a tener listo los materiales que necesita y llevar a cabo dicha actividad.
Su objetivo es mantener su trabajo y ayudar a su familia y sobre todo a su hija en sus estudios.
texts.en:
Adelio is a farmer. He lives with his wife and eight year-old daughter in San Rafael Oriente, department of San Miguel. He has been working the land for 15 years, a skill he learned from his father. He works every day of the week from 6:00 AM to 4:00 PM, in order to meet the demands of farming.

He is requesting a loan to buy organic and inorganic fertilizers, as he is about to start planting corn and beans. This loan will help him to have the materials he needs on hand and to accomplish the aforementioned task. His goal is to keep working and to help his family, and above all, to support his daughter's education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio, reside en  San Rafael Oriente, departamento de Morazán, se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijol, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 7 y 5 años de edad, Julio aprendió de su padre el proceso de la siembra de maíz y frijol, trabaja todos los días de 6:00am a 4:00pm.
Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de abono y fertilizantes, estos son necesarios para la siembra de maíz, con estos materiales espera tener los insumos que necesita el proceso  y llevar a cabo el trabajo del cual depende su familia.
Su objetivo es tener el negocio por mucho tiempo, recibir buenas cosechas para poder comercializar y ayudar a sus hijos en sus estudios.
texts.en:
Julio lives in San Rafael Oriente, in the region of Morazán. He plants corn and beans. He lives with his wife and two children who are 7 and 5 years old. Julio learned how to plant corn and beans from his father. He works every day from 6:00am to 4:00pm.
He is asking for the loan to buy manure and fertilizer. These are necessary for the planting of corn. With these materials he hopes to have the materials that the process needs, and to carry out the work that his family relies upon.
His goal is to have the business for a long time, have good harvests to be able to sell in the market, and help his children in their studies.

loans.use: To buy manure and fertilizer.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Alcatracez Group

texts.es: Esta foto fue tomada en casa de la señora Marcia Díaz, un miembro del grupo "ALCATRACEZ" que esta ubicado en el estado de Veracruz, Mexico. Se ve al grupo de señoras muy contentas en la foto, ella se dedica a la venta de calzado que inicio hace 11 años, solicita el prestamo para la compra de mercancia y asi incrementar su negocio, al momento de solicitar este prestamo se siente contenta y con muchos animos, ella tiene 29 años, estudio hasta la preparatoria, es casada y tiene 1 hija. La señora Marcia quiere este prestamo para incrementar sus ganacias, tambien espera que su negocio crezca mas para poder generar más ganancias y ser reconocida por la calidad de sus productos. Maribel D. es otra integrante del grupo, ella es la presidenta, tiene 45 años, estudio hasta la secundaria, es casada, y tiene 2 hijos, ella se dedica a la venta de Antojitos de comal que inicio hace 4 años, solicita el prestamo para asi incrementar su negocio y tener siempre materia prima para todos sus clientes, ya que les gusta mucho como cocina y se le acaba siempre su producto; Maribel se siente muy contenta ya que gracias a esta oportunidad va a poder brindarles educación a sus hijos y una vida de calidad. El grupo esta conformado por 9 integrantes y es la cuarta vez que solicitan un prestamo. oBSERVACIONES, EN LA FOTO APARECEN DOS HIJOS DE LAS SEÑORAS.
texts.en: This photo was taken in the house of Mrs. Marcia Díaz, a member of the "ALCATRACEZ" group that is located in the state of Veracruz, Mexico. You can see that the group of ladies looks very happy in the photo. She [Marcia] has sold footwear for 11 years. She is asking for the loan to buy merchandise and therefore expand her business. When asking for this loan, she is happy and in high spirits. She is 29 years old, studied through high school, is married, and has one daughter. Marcia wants this loan to increase her earnings. She also hopes that her business grows more to be able to generate more earnings and to be recognized for the quality of her products. Maribel D. is another member of the group. She is the president. She is 45 years old, studied through high school, is married, and has 2 children. She has been selling snacks that she prepares on a hot plate for four years. She is asking for the loan to expand her business and to always have raw materials for all of her customers. Since they really like how she cooks, she always runs out of her product. Maribel feels very happy since, thanks to this opportunity, she is going to be able to provide an education and a life of quality for her children. The group is made up of 9 members and this is the fourth time that they are asking for a loan. NOTE: TWO CHILDREN OF THE LADIES APPEAR IN THE PHOTO.

loans.use: to invest in footwear and raw materials to make snacks on a hotplate.

loans.name: Jose Romeo

texts.es:
José, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, vive con sus padres, es soltero y aprendió el oficio con la ayuda de su padre, trabaja todos los días desde hace 8 años.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de abonos y fertilizantes, también tratamiento para plagas, esta compra es muy importante ya que sin estos materiales no se puede realizar la siembra.
Para José su principal objetivo es poder continuar cultivando y recibir las mejores cosechas, ya que de su trabajo ayuda a su familia.
texts.en:
José lives in San Rafael Oriente, San Miguel Department.  He grows corn and beans.  He lives with his parents.  He’s single and learned his ccupation from his father.  He’s been working every day for the last 8 years.

He is asking for a loan to buy manure, fertilizer and insecticide.  This purchase is important because without these supplies he cannot carry out his planting.

For José, his main objective is to continue farming and to produce the best harvests because from his work he’s able to help his family.

loans.use: to buy manure, fertilizer and insecticide.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Yesebella Karen

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN INMACULADA CONCEPCION-ANTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yesebella Karen; ella tiene 23 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de librería, ella vende libros, colores, lapiceros, cuadernos entre otras cosas y también la socia estudia derecho en la universidad de la ciudad de Cusco, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de librería. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería al por mayor para la libreria. 
                                     

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Yesebella Karen, 23, is a member of the “VIRGEN INMACULADA CONCEPCION-ANTA” communal bank located in Anta District which belongs to Anta Province, Cusco Department.

She is single and alternates her daily chores with running a bookstore.  She sells books, colored pencils, mechanical pencils and notebooks, among other things.  She also is studying Law at the University of the City of Cusco.  She wants to expand her bookstore business and is asking for a loan to buy merchandise at wholesale for it.

She is happy about the loan and commits to repay.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her bookstore at wholesale.

loans.name: Maria Leonor

texts.es:
María es una mujer de 52 años de edad que vive con su hijo en una casa propia de condición humilde, en el distrito de Monsefú, Lambayeque. María vive en una zona urbana dentro de una comunidad cuya gente se caracteriza por ser gente emprendedora con muchos  deseos de salir adelante.

Desde hace 20 años María se encarga de venderle a los monsefuanos (oriundos de Monsefú)  productos para sus desayunos como salchichas, jamones, quesos, mantequilla, etc .Es decir embutidos y otros alimentos necesarios para complementar los banquetes matutinos. El negocio de María se encuentra ubicado en  una esquina estratégica de la zona donde circulan los transportistas  y es por ello que ella conoce muy bien de su negocio y tiene una clientela ya establecida. 

María solicita un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa, para comprar una congeladora  con la que pueda mantener en buenas condiciones sus embutidos  y además comprar más productos ya que por ser tan conocida en la zona , su demanda ha aumentado  en los últimos días. Los productos que María brinda son muy requeridos porque son de muy buena calidad.

María cuenta con un buen comportamiento de pagos, anteriormente manejó siete créditos cancelados  puntualmente.
texts.en:
María is a 52-year-old woman living with her son in her own humble abode in Monsefú District, Lambayeque.  María lives in an urban zone within a community whose residents are noted for being enterprising people with a strong drive to get ahead.

For the last 20 years María has been selling “Monsefuanos” (people from Monsefú) breakfast items like sausage, ham, cheese, butter, etc.  That is, cured meats and other food items needed to complement their breakfast banquets.  María’s business is located on a strategic corner busy with transportation providers so María knows her business very well and has a well established clientele.

María is asking for a 2000 new sol loan from Edpyme Alternativa to buy a freezer to keep her cured meats in good condition and also to buy more products because, since she’s so well known in the area, demand has increased recently.  The items María provides are in high demand because they are of very good quality.

María has good repayment behavior.  She has managed seven previous loans and has repaid them on time.

loans.use: to buy a freezer and more cured meats for her business.

loans.name: Yaver

texts.ru: Yaver A. 43 qoda. On jenat i imeyet uje dvux detey odin iz kotorix uchitsya v shkole. Yavar yavlyayetsya IDP personom on pereselenec iz Fuzuli qoroda, seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione, posolok Kurdmakhmudlu vmeste so svoyey lubimoy semyoy. Yavar uje 2 qoda kak rabotayet taxistom, ranshe on zanimalsya skotovodstvom no potom reshil pomenyat svoy bizness i etim nachal imet bolshe priboli. Eto uje vtoraya ssuda Yavera v perviy raz on blar 800$ za chto on blagodaren lenderam i Kive, on uspeshno vernul ssudu. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit nujniye zapchasti dlya pochinki svoyey mashini.
texts.en: Yaver A. is 43 years old.  His is married and has two children, one of whom is still in school.  Yavar is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person).  He is a refugee from Fuzuli city who now lives with his beloved family in the Fuzuli region in Kurdmakhmudlu village. Yavar has been driving a taxi for two years.  Before that, he was a herdsman, but he decided to change professions to receive a greater income. This is his second loan.  The first time, Yaver borrowed $800.  He is very thankful to Kiva lenders, and successfully repaid the loan.  Now he needs 2000 AZN to buy repair parts to fix his car.

loans.use: to buy parts to repair his car

loans.name: Irma

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN INMACULADA CONCEPCION-ANTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Anta, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Irma; ella tiene 54 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y también se dedica a la crianza de animales, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y crianza de animales. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos de tienda de abarrotes y alimento para los animales. 
                                    
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower belongs to the “Virgen Inmaculada Concepción - Anta” communal bank, located in the Anta district of Anta province in the department of Cusco.

Sra. Irma, who is 54, is married and has 4 children. She alternates her daily activities between a grocery store business and raising animals. Irma wants to expand both businesses. She requests the loan in order to purchase products for her grocery store and feed for the animals. 
                                    
Irma is happy about the loan and is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to purchase products for her grocery store and feed for her animals.

loans.name: Luciano

texts.es:
Luciano, reside en San Rafael Oriente departamento de San Miguel, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 8 y 6 años de edad, se dedica a las labores agrícolas, trabaja cultivando maíz y frijol, tiene 15 años de dedicarse a estas actividades, su horario es de 7:00am a 2:00pm.
Él iniciara el proceso de la siembra de maíz y frijol, que inicia con preparar el terreno y la compra de los materiales agrícolas como abono y fertilizantes, que son usados tanto para sembrar maíz como para el frijol, para dar un buen comienzo solicita un préstamo por la cantidad que estima gastara en la obtención de los materiales.
Su único riesgo es la fuerza del invierno, ya que puede afectarle o beneficiarle para el cultivo, su aspiración son sus hijos, por quienes se esfuerza todos los días para llevar el sustento diario, también apoyándolos en sus estudios.
texts.en:
Luciano lives with his wife and two children, aged 8 and 6 years old, in San Rafael Oriente in the department of San Miguel. He does agricultural work, growing corn and beans, and has done so for 15 years, working from 7:00 am to 2:00 pm. 

He will be starting the work of planting the corn and beans, which begins with preparing the land and purchasing agricultural materials. Manure and fertilizers are used to give the crops, both corn and beans, a good start. Luciano requests a loan for the amount that he expects to spend on purchasing these materials. 

His only risk is the severity of the winter, since it could affect his crops for better or worse. His dreams are for his children; he works every day to provide their daily needs and to support them in their studies.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and manure.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to invest in clothing for her business.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.es:
Concepción, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, es agricultor, vive con su esposa y un hijo de 6 años de edad, él trabaja desde hace 10 años en las actividades agrícolas, todos los días de 6:00am a 3:00pm.
Actualmente necesita un préstamo el cual invertirá en abono y fertilizantes, el préstamo le ayudara a asegurarse con todos los insumos agrícolas para el cultivo de maíz y frijol.
Él tiene como objetivo cada años mejorar sus cultivos, trabajar por recibir buenas cosechas y de esta manera sacar adelante a su hijo en sus estudios.
texts.en:
Concepción lives in San Rafael Oriente, San Miguel Department.  He’s a farmer living with his wife and 6-year-old son.  He’s worked in farming for the last ten years every day from 6am until 3pm.

He needs a loan to buy manure and fertilizer.  With the loan he will be sure to have all the necessary supplies for his corn and bean crops.

His ultimate goal yearly is to improve his crops, to work towards attaining good harvests in order to support the family and help his son with his schooling.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Jeovanny Omar

texts.es:
Jeovany, se dedica al cultivo de maíz y crianza de ganado,  vive con su esposa y tres hijos de 5, 7 y 9 años de edad, residen en El Transito departamento de San Miguel, inicio hace 12 años a trabajar junto a su padre, quien se encargo de enseñarle todos los procesos, su horario es de 6:00am a 3:00pm.
Actualmente necesita un préstamo para la compra de abono y fertilizantes, pues ya inicia la temporada agrícola y el dispone de ánimos para realizar la siembra de este año, este préstamo le ayudara a tener todo lo necesario para dar los cuidados al cultivo.
Él quiere trabajar fuerte para ayudar a su familia y sacarlos adelante y que sus hijos estudien.
texts.en:
Jeovany raises corn and livestock.  He lives with his wife and three children who are 5, 7, and 9 years of age.  They live in El Transito, San Miguel Department.  He started working 12 years ago alongside his father who taught him all the skills.  His schedule is 6am to 3pm.

He needs a loan to buy manure and fertilizer because the farming season is starting and he’s willing to start this year’s planting.  This loan will help him have everything necessary for the care of his crops.

He wants to work hard to help his family get ahead and to see that his children study.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es: Maribel de 26 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Candelario de 32 años y sus  queridos hijos Percy de 07 años y Maricarla de 04 años de edad a quien desea brindar un mejor bienestar. Maribel y su pareja son el pilar de sus hijos, desde muy niña sus padres le inculcaron a remover la tierra, es por ello que aprendió a labrar la tierra. Hoy cuenta con 05 hectáreas de terreno cultivado con plantas de barbasco, cacao y café. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de los peones quienes se encargan de cosechar y trasladar los frutos hasta los tendales. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es caminar por las áreas verdes y respirar aire puro que le brinda la naturaleza. Considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos desde su comunidad hasta los centros de acopio ubicados en la ciudad de San Francisco; lugar donde percibe mejores precios por sus productos. Su dificultad radica en no poder contar con suficiente ingreso económico para solventar los pagos por adelantado a los jornaleros quienes le brindan el apoyo con la extracción de sus frutos y sacar la maleza de sus campos; es por ello que acude a los préstamos que facilita la institución MFP. Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es sembrar más plantas de café ya que cuenta con terrenos por cultivar. Este su segundo crédito de Maribel con MFP, sabe que si lo paga a tiempo, podrá acceder a otro préstamo con mayor tranquilidad. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles contratará jornaleros para que le apoyen en las cosechas de café y sacar la maleza de sus tierras.
texts.en:
Maribel, 26, is a very hard working woman.  She lives in her own house with her partner, Candelario, 32, and their beloved children: Percy, 7, and Maricarla, 4, for whom she wants to provide a better wellbeing. Maribel and her partner are their children’s pillars.  

Since she was a young girl her parents taught her to work the land and she learned how to till the soil.  Today, she has 5 hectares of cultivated fields growing coffee, barbasco (an evergreen bush) and cocoa beans.  During harvest time she hires laborers to bring in the crops and transport the fruit to the drying spots.  What she likes best about her work is wandering among the green areas breathing in the pure air that nature provides.  She considers the most difficult part of the job having to transport her products from her community to the gathering centers located in the city of San Francisco which is where the best prices are to be had.  Her difficulty rests in not being able to find sufficient funds to pay her workers in advance for bringing in the crop and clearing out the weeds from her fields.  This is why she calls on the loans that MFP makes available. However, her main priority now is to plant more coffee plants because she has fields available to do so.  

This is her second loan with MFP.  She knows that if she repays it on time she will be able to access another loan more easily.  She will use the requested 1500 new soles to hire field hands to help her with the coffee harvest and to clear weeds from her fields.

loans.use: to hire field hands to harvest coffee and clear out the weeds.

loans.name: Nueva Esperanza Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “NUEVA ESPERANZA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a L. provincia D. Cusco y departamento D. Cusco.

L. socia es L. Sra. Sayda; elL. es conviviente y tiene 30 años y tiene 2 hijos; L. socia trabaja con su negocio D. venta D. tienda D. abarrotes y también hace servicio D. llamadas en forma ambulatoria, L. socia trabaja en L. tienda D. abarrotes desD. las 8:00 a.m hasta las 2:00 p.m y en las tardes realiza el en servicio D. llamadas, por medio D. este negocio L. socia saca adelante a sus hijos, L. socia quiere ampliar el negocio D. tienda D. abarrotes y servicio D. llamadas. L. socia solicita el préstamo para comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite y fideos para L. tienda D. abarrotes y también para pagar las líneas D. teléfono.


Los otros socios  se dedican al transporte, servicio D. taxi, venta D. teléfonos, negocio D. tienda D. abarrotes y venta D. carros.


L. socia agradece a quienes forman parte D. este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the communal bank "Nueva Esperanza".  The bank is located in the district, province and department of Cusco. 

Señora Sayda is 30 years old, has 2 children and lives with her partner.  She runs a grocery store and also has a calling service that she runs in an itinerant manner.  She works in her grocery store from 8:00 am until 2:00 pm and in the afternoon she runs her calling service.  Through these businesses she is able to proviD. for her children.  She wants to expand her grocery business and her calling service.  She is requesting a loan to buy rice, sugar, oil and noodles for her grocery store and also to pay for the phone lines.  

The other members jobs incluD. transport, taxi service, telephone sales, grocery store and car sales. 

Señora Sayda is grateful to those who will make this dream a reality.  She is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar, oil and noodles for her grocery store and to also pay for her phone lines

loans.name: Maria Melany

texts.es:
María, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, vive con su esposo y tres hijos de 18, 14 y 9 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de pupusas y refrescos, desde hace 2 años y fue por iniciativa propia, trabaja todos los días de 9:00am a 6:00pm.
Ella necesita un préstamo para la compra de queso, chicharrón, aceite y más materiales necesarios para la elaboración de las pupusas, esta inversión le ayudara para fortalecer el negocio y poder aumentar la producción diaria de pupusas.
Su objetivo es mantener el negocio para apoyar a su familia, sacar a sus hijos adelante, que estudien y puedan superarse.
texts.en:
María lives in San Rafael Oriente, San Miguel Department with her husband and three children who are 18, 14, and 9 years of age. She sells pupusas (typical Salvadoran fast food) and soft drinks.  She started two years ago on her own initiative.  She works every day from 9am until 6pm.

She needs a loan to buy cheese, pork skin, oil and other supplies needed to make pupusas.  This investment will help her strengthen the fussiness and increase daily pupusa production.

Her objective is to keep the business to support her family, move her children ahead so that they can study and better themselves.

loans.use: to buy cheese, pork skin and oil.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Consuelo

texts.es:
Consuelo es una madre de familia de  dos niños y tiene 41 años de edad, ella vive con su esposo en el caserío (comunidad de pobladores de clase baja)  de SAQA, en el distrito de Zaña  ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo. Esta comunidad es conocida por sus actividades agrícolas y por el buen desarrollo y desempeño de sus s pobladores en éstas.

Consuelo tiene muy buenas referencias personales en su caserío, es conocida por ser una persona amable y atenta con los demás y además por ser una madre cariñosa y dedicada a sus niños. 

Consuelo se dedica al cultivo de fréjol y ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 000 nuevos soles a Edpyme  Alternativa, para poder invertir en los fertilizantes y maquinarias que le faltan y también para poder saldar las cuentas con los trabajadores que le ayudan a mejorar sus tierras de cultivo.

Consuelo tiene experiencia crediticia con buenas referencias en Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Consuelo is the mother of two children.  She’s 41 years old and lives with her husband in the SAQA hamlet (a community of low income residents) in Zaña District located in Chiclayo Province.  This community is known for its farming activities and for the good farming practices of its residents.
Consuelo has very good personal references in her hamlet.  She’s known to be a kind person who looks after others and also for being an affectionate mother who is devoted to her children.

Consuelo farms broad beans and has asked for a 3000 new sol loan from Edpyme Alternativa to buy fertilizer and some machinery she’s lacking as well as to pay workers that help her improve her farmland.

Consuelo has experience with loans and has good references in Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and harvesting machinery.

loans.name: Marino

texts.es: Marino, de 48 años de edad, natural del distrito de San Miguel, convive con Eugenia de 50  años de edad y juntos viven en su propia casa con sus 07 hijos donde reina la armonía. La labor que realiza Marino es labrar la tierra, donde cultiva cacao, café y plátano, en total cuenta con 06 hectáreas de terreno. Sus padres le enseñaron a remover la tierra y con el tiempo acumuló dinero para que pueda comprar su propia parcela. Es conocedor del arduo trabajo en el campo; donde viene trabajando 22 años en sus propias tierras, en tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos y jornaleros quienes se encargan de trasladar los productos cosechados hasta cierto tramo; para luego poder comercializarlos. Se siente muy comprometido con su trabajo; porque gracias a su esfuerzo cotidiano hoy disfruta al ver que sus plantas le resultan, así obteniendo buenas ganancias; cuenta además que la temporada de invierno no es de su agrado, porque son meses donde abundan mayor cantidad de insectos perjudicando así sus sembríos. Este es su 12avo crédito con MFP, sabe que si lo paga a tiempo, podrá acceder a otro préstamo con mayor tranquilidad y sin traerle complicaciones a su banco comunal. El crédito solicitado es para la de compra de plantas de cacao para injertarlos y sacar buen provecho de sus frutos en menor tiempo.
texts.en:
Marino, 48, is from San Miguel District.  He lives with Eugenia, 50, in their own house where harmony reigns with their 7 children.  Marino is a cocoa bean, coffee and banana farmer.   He has a total of 6 hectares of farmland.  His parents taught him how to till the soil and in time he saved up money to buy his own parcel.  He knows what hard field work is for he’s been working his own lands for 22 years.  

During harvest time he is helped by his children and hired field hands who transport the harvested fruit a certain distance to be sold.  He feels very committed to his work because, thanks to his daily efforts, today he enjoys watching the results his plants produce: good profits. He comments that he’s not very fond of winter because insects that damage his crops are abundant during those months.

This is his 12th loan with MFP.  He knows that if he repays it on time he’ll be able to access another loan more easily and not create problems for his communal bank.  He will use the requested loan to buy cocoa bean plants to graft and get profits from them in a shorter time.

loans.use: to buy cocoa bean plants.

loans.name: Pedro Emilio

texts.es:
Pedro, reside en San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, se dedica a la crianza de ganado y cultivo de maíz y frijol, él desde hace 10 años cultiva maíz, frijol, cebolla y chile, este trabajo lo aprendió de su padre, trabaja todos los días de 6:00am a 4:00pm.
El realizara la compra de los insumos agrícolas y solicita un préstamo para poder adquirir abono y fertilizantes, este préstamo le ayudara para iniciar la siembra y tener todo lo necesario.
Su objetivo es trabajar fuertemente para ayudar a sus hijos en sus estudios y velar por su bienestar.
texts.en: Pedro lives in San Rafael Oriente in the department of San Miguel.  He raises cattle and for the last 10 years he has been growing corn, beans, onions and peppers.   He learned this trade from his father.  He works everyday from 6:00 am until 4:00 pm.  He will purchase farming supplies and is requesting a loan to buy compost and fertilizers.  This loan will help him to have all that he needs to start planting.  His goal is to work hard in order to help his children with their education and to ensure their well-being.

loans.use: to purchase compost and fertilizers.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Eldeniz

texts.ru: Eldeniz jenat i imeyet odnoqo rebonka. On yavlyayetsya IDP personom pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda, seychas vmeste s jenoy i detmi projivayet v Fuzuli regione. Eldeniz K. 29 let. On uje 4 qoda kak zanimayetsya skotovodstvom i razvodit korov. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2300 AZN chtobi kupit korov. Eldeniz iz poluchennoko moloko ot korov delayet yogurti i kefir potom prodayot ix v magazini. Yeqo molochniye produkti shitayustay ochen xoroshimi.
texts.en: Eldeniz is married and has one child.  He is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person).  He is a refugee from Fuzuli city who now lives in Fuzuli region with his wife and child.  Eldeniz K. is 29 years old.  He has been raising cattle for four years.  Now, he needs 2300 AZN to buy a cow.  With the milk he receives, Eldeniz makes yogurt and kefir to sell in stores.  His dairy products are considered very high quality.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Fuentes Group

texts.es: Esta foto fue tomada en la casa de la señora Graciela B. una integrante del grupo "FUENTES", que esta ubicado en el Estado de Veracruz en México. Se ve al grupo de señoras al rededor de Graciela en la foto. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa que inicio hace 5 años. Solicita el prestamo para comprar mas mercancia de temporada y así ofrecerles más variedad a sus clientas para todos los gustos y tallas. Sus compañeras y vecinos la conocen por ser persona responsable, trabajadora y dedicada a su familia. Al momento de solicitar este prestamo se siente satisfecha ya que podra incrementar sus ventas y tener mas clientes lo que le permitira incrementar sus ganancias y poder de manera apoyar a su familia. Tiene 24 años, estudio la carrera tecnica en enfermeria, es casada y tiene en total 3 hijos. Quiere este prestamo para comprar ropa de temporada. Tambien espera más adelante poder realizar unos arreglos a su casa y seguir apoyando a sus hijos en sus estudios para que tengan un mejor futuro y logren sus sueños y así nunca les haga falta nada.
texts.en:
This photo was taken in Mrs. Graciela B.’s house.  She is one of the members of the “FUENTES” (Fountains) group located in the State of Veracruz, México.  The group of women can be seen surrounding Graciela in the photo.

She started selling clothes five years ago.  She is asking for the loan to buy more seasonal merchandise in assorted styles and sizes to have more variety available to offer her customers. 

Her fellow group members and neighbors know her for being a responsible, hard working woman who is devoted to her family.  She feels very satisfied with the loan because she’ll be able to increase sales and have more customers which will make it possible for her to increase profits thus supporting her family.

She is 24 years old and studied Technical Nursing.  She’s married and has a total of three children.  She wants this loan to buy seasonal clothes.  She also hopes later on to get ahead on home improvements and to continue supporting her children’s schooling so that they will have a better future, will see their dreams come true and so that they will never lack anything.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothes.

loans.name: Emprendedoras Mb Group

texts.es: ESTA FOTO FUE TOMADA EN LA CASA DE LA SEÑORA ARIANA A. G. UNA INTEGRANTE DEL GRUPO EMPRENDEDORAS MB, QUE ESTA UBICADO EN VERACRUZ, MÉXICO. SE VEN LAS SEÑORAS EN LA FOTO MOSTRANDO SU MERCANCIA QUE VENDE, ELLA SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE NOVEDADES Y MANUALIDADES QUE INICIO HACE 3 AÑOS. SOLICITA EL PRESTAMO PARA INVERTIR EN MATERIA PRIMA PARA REALIZAR SU PRODUCTO, SUS CLIENTAS LA CONSIDERAN UNA PERSONA RESPONSABLE Y AGRADABLE EN QUIEN PUEDE CONFIAR. AL MOMENTO DE SOLICITAR ESTE PRESTAMO SE SIENTE SATISFECHA POR PODER REINVERTIR EN SU NEGOCIO. ELLA TIENE 21 AÑOS, ESTUDIO HASTA EL BACHILLERATO, ES SOLTERA, QUIERE EL CREDITO PARA INVERTIR EN SUS MANUALIDADES, TAMBIEN ESPERA PODER AHORRA DE LAS GANANCIAS Y SUPERARSE PERSONALMENTE Y APOYAR A SU FAMILIA EN LOS GASTOS ECONOMICOS.
texts.en:
This photo was taken in Mrs. Ariana A. G’s house.  She is one of the members of the "Emprendedoras MB" Group located in Veracruz, México.  The women can be seen in the photo displaying the merchandise they sell.

She sells novelties and crafts.  She started three years ago.  She is asking for the loan to buy raw materials to make her items.  Her customers consider her to be a responsible, pleasant person that they can trust.

She feels satisfied with the loan because she’ll be able to reinvest in her business.  She is 21 years old and finished high school.  She’s single and wants the loan to invest in her crafts.  She also hopes to be able to save up some of her profits and improver herself personally and to help her family with expenses.

loans.use: to buy crafts supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wine glasses, artificial flowers, silicon, and assorted ribbons.

loans.name: Evangelina

texts.es:
A la vivienda de la señora Evangelina le esta haciendo falta la barda al frente de su casa pero en este momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para realizar la mejora. 
Es por eso que esta solicitando su cooperación para poder comprar el material que es block, cemento, arena y pagarle a la persona que se encargara de construir la barda.
Pagara el crédito con el ingreso que obtiene como empleada de limpieza de una casa, ya que su esposo se encargara de los gastos familiares con el sueldo que recibe del su trabajo en una compañía de trasportes. Desea la seguridad de su familia.
texts.en:
Evangelina's house needs a wall in front but she doesn't have the money now to build it.  That is why she is requesting your help so that she can buy the construction materials such as blocks, cement and sand, and also to be able to pay the person who will build it.
She will pay off the loan with the money she gets as a cleaning lady in a house now that her husband pays the household expenses with his income from his work at a transportation company.   She wants safety for her family.

loans.use: To construct a wall in front of her house

loans.name: Union Y Solidaridad Group

texts.es: Esta foto fue tomada en la casa de la señora Minerva P., un integrante del grupo "Unión y Solidaridad", que esta ubicado en el Estado de Veracruz en México. Se ve al grupo de señoras al rededor de Minerva en la foto. Ella se dedica a la venta de linea blanca que inicio hace 5 años. Solicita el prestamo para comprar más mercancia. Sus compañeras y vecinos la conocen por ser una persona responsable y trabajadora. Al momento de solicitar este prestamo se siente satisfecha ya que podra incrementar sus ventas lo que le permitira incrementar sus ganancias y asi poder ayudar  a su familia. Tiene 27 años, estudio el bachillerto, vive en union libre y tiene en total 1 hija. Quiere este credito para comprar mas mercancia de linea blanca. Tambien espera mas adelante poder realizar unos arreglos a su casa y seguir apoyando a su familia para que logren sus objetivos y ofrecerle a su hija una C. profesional y un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
This photo was taken at Minerva P.’s house.  She is a member of the “Unión y Solidaridad” (Unity and Solidarity) which is located in the State of Veracruz in Mexico.  The women in the group can be seen aroud Minerva in the photo.  She has been selling domestic appliances for five years.

She is requesting the loan to buy more merchandise.  Her colleagues and neighbors know her to be a responsible and hard-working woman.  She is happy about requesting the loan because she will be able to increase her sales.  This will allow her to increase her earnings, and then she will be able to help her family.

She is 27 years old, and she has a high school education.  She is in a common-law marriage, and she has one daughter.  

She wants to use this loan to buy more domestic appliances.  She also hopes to later be able to make some repairs on her house.  She wants to keep supporting her family in order to achieve her objectives.  She wants to give her daughter a professional career and a better future.

loans.use: to invest in her domestic appliance business.

loans.name: Carlos Gilbel

texts.es:
Carlos, reside San Rafael Oriente, departamento de San Miguel, es agricultor, vive con su esposa y tres hijos, de 11, 9 y 5 años de edad, tiene 12 años de dedicarse al cultivo de maíz y frijol.
Actualmente necesita un préstamo para la compra de abono y fertilizantes, ya que iniciara las labores de siembra, este préstamo le ayudara tener los insumos necesarios y poder continuar con su trabajo, ya que de él depende su familia. 
El objetivo de él es trabajar por su familia y que no les falte la alimentación diaria, así mismo que sus hijos estudien.
texts.en:
Carlos lives in San Rafael Oriente in the San Miguel department.  He is a farmer.  He lives with his wife and their three children, ages 11, 9, and 5.  He has been growing corn and beans for 12 years.

He now needs a loan to buy natural and chemical fertilizers because he will be starting the work of planting.  This loan will help him to have the necessary supplies to be able to continue with his work because his family depends upon him.

His objectives are to work for his family so that they do not lack their daily sustenance and for his children go to school.

loans.use: to buy natural and chemical fertilizers.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Martha Alicia

texts.es:
Martha, reside en San Miguel, se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, vive con su hija y su esposo, atiende el negocio de 6:00am a 4:00pm, su ventaja es que no tiene competencia cerca.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de frutas y verduras como: manzanas, sandias, melocotón, fresas, y las verduras, tomates, güisquil, pipianes, entre otros, con esta inversión espera desarrollarse aun más en el comercio.
