texts.es: El Joven Carlos se dedica al servicio de transporte con vehículo de su propiedad, y cuando no trabaja con su taxi, se dedica a trabajar como mecánico, tiene una experiencia de dos años en dicha actividad después que regreso de España, se compro su auto, vive en domicilio de su propiedad junto a  su hermana y cuñado, solicita el monto para la refacción de su vehículo ya que este sufrió un accidente y tiene que realizar la refacción de su vehículo para poder retomar la actividad de transporte, es un joven trabajador con ganas de superación y se encuentra a gradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Carlos provides public transportation services with his own vehicle, and when he is not working with his taxi, he works as a mechanic. He has two years' experience in the business. When he arrived back from Spain he purchased a car. He lives in a house that he owns together with his sister and his brother-in-law. He requests a loan to carry out maintenance repairs to his car as it suffered an accident and he need to repair it before he can start providing transport services again. He is a young worker who is eager to improve. He is thankful to the organization for their support.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle and automotive spare parts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase materials she needs to improve her stable.

loans.name: Maria Maritza

texts.es:
María es una esposa y madre de familia de dos niños, tiene 36 años de edad y vive en la zona urbano marginal ( de condición pobre ) del distrito de Lambayeque, una zona pequeña que cuenta con un aproximado de 100 familias.
	
Desde hace 2 años María realiza el servicio de mototaxi (servicio de transporte público muy común en las pequeñas comunidades del Perú, que consta de una moto que cuenta con una cabina en la parte trasera donde se llevan los pasajeros). El servicio de transporte público que brinda María, es generalmente un trabajo que realizan los hombres en el Perú, pero ella se ha sabido adecuar a las dificultades que se le han presentado en el camino, pues con el dinero de este servicio ella ayuda a su esposo con las cuentas del hogar.

María es una mujer hacendosa que además de ser mototaxista,  trabaja en una veterinaria lo que le permite tener ingresos adicionales que gasta en sus niños.

María solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 700 nuevos soles que invertirá  en la compra de una carpa (especie de toldo que cierra la cabina de la moto) y la renovación de asientos para su vehículo. Esto le permitirá tener mayor clientela.

María es un cliente antiguo de Edpyme Alternativa y cuenta con un excelente récord de pagos.
texts.en:
Maria is a wife and the mother of a family of two children. She is 36 years old and she lives in the suburban region (in poor conditions) of the district of Lambayeque. It is a small community which consists of approximately 100 families.

For the past 2 years Maria has been providing motorcycle rickshaw services (a public transportation service that is very common in small communities in Peru. The vehicle consists of a cabin in the rear section used for passengers). The public transportation services that Maria provides is usually work that is performed by men in Peru. But she has known to adapt to difficulties that she has encountered along the way. The income that she earns with this business she is able to help her husband with the household expenses. 

Maria is an industrious woman who, aside from being a rickshaw driver, she also has a pet store. This helps her to have additional income that she spends on her children. 

Maria requests from Edpyme Alternativa a loan of 700 nuevos soles and she will invest in the purchase of a tarp (a type of awning that encloses the cabin of the rickshaw) and in the renovation of the seats of the vehicle. This will permit her to have more clients.

Maria is a long-time client of Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) and she has an excellent payment record.

loans.use: to purchase an awning for her rickshaw and to renovate the seats.

loans.name: Nicholus

texts.en: Nicholus is 28 years old and single. He has been selling shoes for five years so as to earn a living. He has managed to sustain his business because of his hard work. He hopes to open other branches of his business in the future. Nicholus joined a group under Faulu Kenya to get financial support. This is because the group members guarantee each other loans. He has requested 20,000 Kes to buy shoes.

loans.use: To buy shoes

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: Sonia tiene 29 años, vive con su esposo en su casa propia. Desde que era muy niña aprendió el trabajo del campo agrícola, hoy a lado de su esposo e hijos trabajan sobre las tierras que le fue heredado por sus padres, y que saca provecho para su propia manutención y la de su familia.  Ahí cultiva papa, maíz, oca, habas entre otros productos así como pastizales que le sirve de forraje para sus animales, que son vendidos para generarse más ingresos mientras espera el tiempo de cosecha de sus productos para luego comercializarlos. Para Sonia estas actividades favorecen mucho en el progreso de su familia, por tanto ha planeado incrementar la cantidad de animales para intensificarse en esta actividad. Es su primer crédito con MFP, fue invitada a formar parte de su banco comunal porque conocen  que es una persona responsable y comprometida, por lo que  esta muy agradecida con los demás integrantes de su grupo por su parte se compromete a ser puntual en sus pagos. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de sacos de abono para sembrar nuevamente pastizales para sus animales.
texts.en: Sonia is 29 years old and she lives with her husband in a house which they own. When she was a young girl she learned about agricultural work. Today, with her husband and children by her side, she works on the land that was inherited to her by her parents. She is able to earn enough to support herself and her family. She cultivates potatoes, corn, okra, fava beans and other products, such as hay that she uses for her livestock. She sells her livestock while she waits for the harvest to be ready and to sell the products. Sonia believes that these businesses are very helpful for the progress of her family. She plans on increasing the number of livestock in order to expand the business. This is her first loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and she was invited to take part in her communal bank because she is known to e a responsible and committed person. She is very thankful to the other members of the group and she is committed to be on time with her payments. She will invest the loan she requests in the purchase of fertilizers to replant hay for her livestock.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers.

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es:
Lidia Agüero Agüero, tiene la edad de 41 años, está casada  y vive con sus 2 hijos y su esposo que son sus mayores prioridades. Ella pretende con el crédito comprar los insumos necesarios para la asistencia de la siembra y pagar la mano de obra de la siembra. Ella cuenta con el terreno, el cual reúne las condiciones adecuadas para su explotación en buenas condiciones, también  a trabajado varios años en este cultivo por lo cual cuenta con mucho conocimiento sobre este, ella pretende generar ganancias e ingresos para así poderles dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y el estudio a sus hijos.
Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Lidia Agüero Agüero is 41 years old, married, and lives with her husband and two children who are her greatest priorities.  She will use the money from this loan to buy supplies she needs for her crops and to pay for farm labor.  She has good farmland, has spent several years on these crops, and she knows them well.  She wants to generate an income so that she can give a better quality of life to her family and provide for her children’s education.  This will be her first loan through FUDECOSUR.  She has not had other loans with state banks, but FUDECOSUR has made it easy for her to get this loan with a low interest rate.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies

loans.name: James

texts.en: James is a 36-year-old business man. He is married and has four school-going children. He sells suitcases, bags and second-hand clothes to earn a living. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has learned how to save his money. He has also witnessed his business grow. He hopes to have a stable business one day. He has requested 20,000 Kes to buy more clothes and suitcases and to renovate his business premises.

loans.use: To buy more clothes and suitcases, and renovate his business premises

loans.name: Homer Francisco

texts.es: Homer Francisco es un hombre casado de 26 años. Que se dedica  a la venta de mercadería en general como ropa y chinelas y zapatos. Desde hace 8 años se dedica a este medio de vida pues  tiene 3 hijos menores de edad a su cargo el se encarga de proporcionarle a su familia los ingresos necesarios. Es por este motivo que solicita este crédito para la compra de perfumes, pañuelos, sabanas, calzado, ropa interior y cosméticos. Por lo que él tiene el negocio ubicado en una parte muy concurrida del mercado para seguir incrementando sus ventas y de paso hacerse más conocido.
texts.en: Homer Francisco is 26 years old and married.  He sells general merchandise, such as clothing, flip flops, and shoes.  He’s been doing this for eight years because he has three children and must support his family.  He is asking for this loan to buy perfumes, handkerchiefs, sheets, footwear, underclothing, and cosmetics.  His business is located in a well trafficked part of the market and he wants to continue increasing his sales and also become better known.

loans.use: to buy inventory items

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: La Sra. Victoria es una cliente antigua de la institución ella tiene tres hijos que ya son independientes, la señora Victoria se dedica a la venta de ropa a pedido ya que le ayuda mucho con el cuidado de su papa que ya es un señor de edad el cual vive con el en la casa, ella a parte de su actividad de venta de ropa también da en alquiler habitaciones en su hogar,  antes la señora tenia un salón de peinados en obrajes, el crédito que esta solicitando es para la compra de mercadería como sacones, chompas para el día de la madre ya que sus clientes ya le están haciendo pedidos, ella es una persona muy trabajadora y esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Victoria is a longtime client of the institution.  She has three adult children and she sells clothing to order.  The income helps her care for her elderly father who lives in her home.  Aside from her clothing business, she also rents out rooms in her home, and used to have a beauty salon there.  She is asking for this loan to buy merchandise such as coats, and sweaters for mothers’ day, now that her friends are making requests.  She is a hard working woman and is grateful for the support from the institution.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for mothers' day

loans.name: El Trebol Magico Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama "EL TREBOL MAGICO", porque las integrantes dicen que el trébol es una hierba de pequeño tamaño que según las creencias trae buena suerte, que proporciona al que lo posee un poder especial: suerte en el comercio, en el amor y en la riqueza. ¡Suerte ilimitada!. El grupo esta ubicado en el Estado de Hidalgo, la señora Ana Paula O. tiene 26 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de pollos desde hace 1 año y medio sus clientes comentan que la señora es muy amable y su pollo siempre esta fresco por esa razón la prefieren, tiene 1 hijo varón. El prestamo lo solicita para la compra de pollos y venderlos para el consumo de la gente y así crear un patrimonio para su hijo, ofrecerle una carrera profesional y una mejor calidad de vida, también desea apoyar a su esposo en los gastos familiares y ahorrar para su futuro.
texts.en:
This group is called "EL TREBOL MAGICO" (The Magic Clover) because its members say that the clover is a small plant that brings good luck and has a special power.  It brings luck in business, love, and wealth.  Unlimited luck!  The group is located in the State of Hidalgo.

Ana Paula O. is 26 years old and has been selling chickens for one year.  Her customers tell her that they prefer buying from her because she’s very friendly and her chicken is always fresh.  She has one son.

She will use the money from this loan to buy chickens to sell and in this way create a means for her son to establish a professional career and a better quality of life.  She also wants to help her husband with the family expenses and save for the future.

loans.use: to buy chickens for resale

loans.name: Mario Pedro

texts.es: El Sr. Mario se dedica al servicio de transporte con vehículo de su propiedad, y cuando no trabaja con su auto, se dedica a trabajar como mecánico, tiene una experiencia de varios años en dicha actividad después de mucho sacrificio compro su auto, vive en domicilio de su propiedad junto a su familia, solicita el monto para la refacción de su vehículo ya que este sufrió un accidente y tiene que realizar la refacción de su vehículo para poder retomar la actividad de transporte, es una persona trabajadora con ganas de superación y se encuentra agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Mario provides transportation services with his vehicle.  When he isn’t working with his car, he works as a mechanic.  He has several years’ experience and bought a car after many years of sacrifice.  He lives in his own place with his family.

He is asking for this loan to buy spare parts for his vehicle because it was in an accident and he needs to repair it so he can resume his transportation services.  He is a hard working person with a desire to get ahead.  He is grateful to the institution for its support.

loans.use: to repair his vehicle

loans.name: Susan Tatiana

texts.es:
Susan Tatiana Méndez C., tiene la edad de 19 años, está soltera  y vive con su hijo que es su mayor prioridad. Ella con el dinero pretende comprar materiales para la confección de ropa. Ella cuenta con las maquinas para la creación de ropa y tiene varios años de trabajar en eso. Ella lo que pretende es generar las ganancias necesarias para seguir adelante con el negocio y darle cada día mas una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo a así poderle dar un mejor futuro. Ella quiere crecer como persona y cada vez ser más fortalecida en este pequeño negocio.
Es el primer  préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Susan Tatiana Méndez C. is 19 years old, single and lives with her son who is her highest priority.  She plans to use the money from this loan to buy material for clothes making.  She has the sewing machines she needs and has been doing this for several years.  What she wants is to earn the necessary income to continue ahead with her business and every day improve her son’s quality of life so she can give him a better future.  She wants to grow as a person and every day be stronger in this business.

This will be her first loan through FUDECOSUR.  She has not had other loans through state banks, but FUDECOSUR has given her a loan, simply and at low interest.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
Lucila  es una mujer de 44 años de edad, cuenta con un lugar propio para vivir que tiene los servicios de agua y luz, ubicado en el caserío Corral de Arena a unos 15 minutos de distancia del distrito de  Olmos  y a más de una hora de la provincia de Chiclayo.  Los habitantes del distrito de Olmos y zonas aledañas o cercanas  se dedican a la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Lucila se dedica desde hace unos años al servicio de la venta de comida en su pequeño restaurante que ha colocadoen la parte anterior de su misma casa para mayor seguridad delmismo en el caserío Corralde Arena. Sus clientes son personas que han venido de otros lugares a vivir ahí y desean degustar de comidas típicas (por ejemplo cuy con papas sancochadas) de la sierra de Ayacucho, por eso el nombre que le ha colocado a su restaurante ( ¨El rinconcito Ayacuchano¨), también da pensión a los que trabajan en el área de agricultura.  Con los ingresos que obtiene de la venta de sus platos de comidad trata de solventar sus gastosdiarios.

Por eso ha solicitado a Edpyme Altyernativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar insumos para la preparación de su platos y así pueda ofrecer una variedad de comidas y no unas cuantas, también va utilizar éste préstamo para mejorar la infraestructura de su negcio para que las personas que lleguen a comer allí se sientan cómodos, satisfechos con la atención y la comida.  Al tener mejoras en su negocio va poder tener más clientes y  tener una mejor calidad de vida.

Lucila con su trabajo y sus ganas de salir adelante se ha ganado la confianza y el respeto de sus vecinos, demostrando que cuando uno tiene un sueño lo puede lograrlo con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación.
texts.en:
Lucila is a 44 year old woman who has her own place to live that includes the basic services, running water and electricity, located in the Corral de Arena settlement, 15 minutes from the Olmos district, and more than one hour from the Chiclayo province.

Lucila has been selling food for several years from her small restaurant located in the rear part of her house for better security.  Her customers are who have lived in other places and want to have typical foods from the Ayacucho region (such as Guinea pig with potatoes).  This is why the restaurant is called “El Rinconcito Ayacuchano.”  She also provides for the pension fund for those who work in agriculture in the area.  She tries to pay the daily expenses with the income from the food.

She has requested a loan of 1,500 PEN through Edpyme Altyernativa, so that she can prepare her dishes and be able to offer a variety of foods to her customers.  She will also use the money from this loan to improve the business’ infrastructure so that the people who go to eat will feel satisfied with the service as well as the food.  By improving the business, she will have more customers and a better quality of life.

Lucila, with her work and desire to get ahead, has earned her neighbors’ trust, showing that when one has a dream, one can achieve it through hard work and dedication.

loans.use: to improve her restaurant

loans.name: Jeannett Del Socorro

texts.es: Jeanet Del Socorro tiene 52 años, se dedica a un taller de costura. Tiene más de 37 años con su negocio. Este negocio lo inicio por medio de unas amigas que a temprana edad le enseñaron a realizar las diferentes prendas de vestir que sus clientes le encargaban, a pesar de que le costaba realizar los encargos que le solicitaban. Con el paso del tiempo es que ha salido adelante agradece el tener un medio de vida, para salir adelante. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de telas, zipper, tijeras, hilos, aceite, encajes, bordados, botones entre otros productos.
texts.en: Jeanet Del Socorro is 52 years old and has a sewing shop.  She has 37 years of experience in this business.  She began it after some friends showed her, at an early age, how to make different types of clothing that was ordered by their customers, even though it cost her to fill the orders.  She’s managed to get ahead over time and is grateful to have a way of life that allows her to get ahead.  She will use the money from this loan to buy fabric, zippers, scissors, thread, oil, pins, borders, buttons, and other things.

loans.use: to buy supplies

loans.name: Ramon

texts.es:
Ramón es un padre de familia trabajador, con el fin de poder apoyar a sus cuatro hijos, ha venido trabajando  con préstamos para lograr hacer las mejoras a su casa.
Trabaja en servicios de seguridad, desde hace varios años, y por su salario viene haciendo las reparaciones poco a poco, ya que tiene que cubrir otros gastos.
Con este nuevo préstamo terminara de cerrar el muro que comenzó hacer, y que le beneficio para cerrar todo, el cual le queda como muro y cerrara un cuarto y necesita poner el techo lo que con este préstamo comprara: láminas de zinc, perlines, golosos, soldadura para poder tener más espacio.
Lo que está contento por lograr cada día la mejora. Gracias a los financiamiento que Afodenic le ha otorgado.
texts.en:
Ramón is a hard working father who wants to support his four children.  He’s been working with loans to make improvements to his home.

He’s been working in security for several years and has been using his salary to make repairs to his home little by little, and pay other expenses.

He will use the money from this new loan to finish building a wall that he started.  This will close off a room he is building, but it will still need a roof.  He will use the money to buy zinc metal sheeting, solder, and other materials.  He is happy because every day gets better, thanks to this loan through Afodenic.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Espuma De Mar Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama “ESPUMA DE MAR”, está integrado por 10 clientas en este grupo se encuentra la señora Rufina Martínez de 51 años de edad, tiene 5 hijos; 2 mujeres y 3 hombres, estudió hasta el Quinto año de primaria, es comerciante y tiene su negocio de abarrotes que inició aproximadamente 15 años, que se ubica en el Estado de México, el prestamo lo solicita para invertir en mercancía como: enlatados, leche, huevo, arroz, frijol, azúcar,Jabón, y carnes frias etc. Lo que ella espera es tener cada día más clientes y que su negocio prospere para gozar de una mejor economía familiar. En este mismo grupo se encuentra la señora Hermelinda Hernández, de 39 años de edad, es casada, tiene 2 hijos varones, estudió hasta el sexto año de primaria, su negocio es de Antojitos Mexicanos quien tiene aproximadamente 3 años trabajando en este negocio, pide este prestamo para invertir en más producto para ofrecerles más variedad, ella considera que sus clientes están muy satisfechos con su negocio ya que dicen que lo que prepara es muy rico; ella comenta que sus planes a futuro son tener un negocio más amplio donde pueda atender a mas clientes lo que representaría mayor ingreso para su familia.
texts.en:
This group is called “ESPUMA DE MAR” (Sea Foam) and is made up of 10 ladies.  Rufina Martínez is a member of the group and has two daughters and three sons.  She has a fifth grade education and started a grocery store in the State of Mexico 15 years ago.  She is asking for this loan so she can buy inventory, such as canned goods, milk, eggs, rice, beans, sugar, soap, and cold cuts.  She wants to have more customers every day and wants her business to prosper so that she can enjoy a better financial situation with her family.

Hermelinda Hernández, age 39, is a member of this same group.  She is married and has two children.  She has a sixth grade education and has been selling Mexican food for about three years.  She is asking for this loan to invest in more products so that she can offer her customers a greater variety.  She feels that they are satisfied because they tell her that her food is delicious.  She tells us that her plans are to expand her business in the future so that she can serve more customers.  This business is her family’s biggest source of income.

loans.use: to buy inventory and ingredients

loans.name: Elda Maritza

texts.es: La señora Elda Maritza tiene 8 años con su negocio de venta de mercadería en general. Esta solicitando un préstamo para poder invertir en mercancía como es calzado, accesorios de belleza para dama, tratamientos, adornos y ropa de temporada que le está haciendo falta y sus clientes le están solicitando que tenga esta mercancía a la venta. Ella se levanta todos los días desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche ya que tiene que realizar las visitas de sus clientes. Desea tener más variedad y estilos de ropa para satisfacer a sus clientes y así aumentar sus ganancias.
texts.en: Elda Maritza has had her business selling general merchandise for 8 years. She is asking for a loan to be able to invest n merchandise such as shoes, women's beauty accesories, treatments, ornaments, and seasonal clothes. She is lacking these products and her customers are asking for her to have it for sale. She gets up every day at 7 in the morning until 9 at night since she has to visit her customers. She wants to have more variety and styles of clothing to satisfy her customers and thus increase her earnings.

loans.use: to obtain merchandise such as shoes, women's beauty accesories, treatments, ornaments and clothes.

loans.name: Los Amigos De Siempre Group

texts.es:
La alcancía comunal “Los Amigos D. Siempre”, esta ubicado en la zona D. Tahuantinsuyo, distrito D. Independencia, es una alcancía que trabaja con EDAPROSPO - Prosperidad desD. hace cuatro meses, esta conformado por 8 socios, asume el cargo D. secretaria la señora Ana María P. D. 50 años D. edad, casada, con 1 hijo D. 13 años D. edad, actualmente se dedica a la venta D. productos D. necesidad en su bodega llamada “GUILLE” desD. hace 10 años, negocio que se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, debido a que su madre se va D. viaje y deseaba cerrarlo es que doña Ana María da inicio a este negocio; su mayor anhelo es comprar una fotocopiadora y aperturar un pequeño bazar, el préstamo solicitado será invertido en la compra D. mercadería.
 Los socios están muy contentos y valoran el apoyo brindado y se comprometen a la devolución  del préstamo en el plazo determinado.
texts.en:
The “Los Amigos D. Siempre” [Friends Forever] community bank is located in the Tahuantinsuyo area, district of Independencia. It is a community bank that has worked with EDAPROSPO - Prosperidad for four months. It is maD. up of 8 members. Ana María P. is the secretary. She is 50 years old, married and has one 13 year old son. At present, she has worked selling basic necessity products in her store called “GUILLE” for 10 years. The business is located in her home since her mother was about to travel and wanted to close it and Ana María took the business over. Her greatest wish is to buy a photocopier and open a small variety store. The loan she has asked for will be invested in buying merchandise.

The members are very happy and value the support offered to them. They are committed to paying back the loan according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizer and potato seed.

loans.name: Maria Manuela

texts.es: Maria Manuela de 43 años, es una mujer inspirada en su familia decidió encontrar una actividad económica. Comenzó con pocos productos para su negocio como cremas, shampoo y calzado fue así que la mayoría de sus vecinos le han encargado diferentes cosas y poco a poco es que ha logrado incrementar su inventario pues es una buena forma de ayuda en los gastos del hogar. En la actualidad trabaja desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche para preparar la variedad de sus productos. este credito es para la compra de perfumes, cremas, calzado, lapiz labial, pintura de uña, ropa en general. En el futuro desea seguir prosperando y mas ventas en su negocio.
texts.en: Maria Manuela, 43, was inspired by her family to find a way to earn an income. She started out with just a few products for her business, like lotions, shampoos, and shoes. Little by little, her neighbors have been requesting additional products and her inventory has slowly grown, since the business is a good way for her to help out with household expenses. She currently works from 7 a.m. till 9 p.m. to prepare her range of products. She will use this loan to purchase perfumes, lotions, lipstick, nail polish, shoes, and clothing. In the future she hopes to continue to prosper and increase her sales.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, lotions, lipstick, nail polish, shoes, and clothing.

loans.name: Francisco Placido

texts.es:
Francisco es un hombre de familia de 43 años de edad, vive con su esposa y su pequeño hijo de 5 años. Su casa está ubicada en el distrito de Tambogrande, departamento de Piura.

La actividad que desarrolla Francisco, desde hace más de  4 años, es la agricultura. Éste cuenta con un terreno donde tiene plantación de mango, limón y plátanos. Además de ello Francisco se dedica al trabajo permanente en labores de campo en el terreno de un vecino y esto le permite recibir ingresos semanales con los que compra el alimento para su esposa e hijo.

Francisco solicita un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles y el destino de éste será para la compra de fertilizantes, para abonar las plantaciones de mango y limón y asegurar una buena producción, algo que le permitirá incrementar sus ventas y tener mayores ingresos que serán destinados para la educación de su pequeño hijo.
texts.en:
Francisco is 43 years old and lives with his wife and their little five-year-old son. Their house is located in the Tambogrande district in the department of Piura.
Francisco has been working as a farmer for more than four years. He has a plot of land where he grows mangos, limes, and bananas. In addition, Francisco also works in a neighbor's fields, which affords him a weekly income that he can use to buy food for his wife and son.
Francisco is requesting a loan of 1500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa, which he will use to buy fertilizers for his mango and lime trees and increase his harvest. This will allow him to increase his sales, and he will use those higher earnings to send his little son to school.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for his mango and lime orchards.

loans.name: Jhanet

texts.es: Jhanet tiene 19  años, vive con sus padres en la propiedad que tienen. Hace más de 2 años se dedica a elaborar bordados típicos de su zona, trabaja todos los días en su misma casa en donde tiene su taller, ahí diseña y elabora las prendas que luego terminadas los lleva a vender en las ferias comerciales de su localidad. Es así que los fines de semana vende en cantidad, asimismo ofrece de manera particular a los negociantes que tiene sus puestos. Al final lo ganado lo invierte nuevamente en la compra de materiales como hilos para continuar con la elaboración de más prendas. Ahora se ha propuesto duplicar su producción,  para lo cual seguirá esforzándose. Es su segundo crédito que tiene con MFP, para ella es una buena experiencia que ha tenido de trabajar de manera grupal y en esta ocasión se compromete a seguir trabajando por la unidad de su equipo  y ser puntual en sus pagos. Con el crédito, lo invertirá en la compra de telas al por mayor que le permitirán  tener una mejor producción.
texts.en:
Jhanet is 19 years old and lives with her parents in their home.  For more than two years she has been making embroidered items which are traditional to her area.  She works every day at home where her workshop is located.  There she designs and makes the items which, once they are finished, she takes to sell in street markets in her town.  On weekends she sells a lot of her products and also sells privately to traders who have sales stalls.  Afterwards, she re-invests what she has earned in buying materials such as threads so that she can continue making more items.  Jhanet has decided to double her production and will continue working hard to achieve this.

This is Jhanet's second loan from MFP.  It has been good experience for her to work as part of a group and she pledges to continue working for the unity of her team and to be punctual in making her repayments.  She will invest her loan in buying fabric wholesale which will allow her to achieve a better production.

loans.use: to buy fabric

loans.name: Hada Francis

texts.es: Hada Francis tiene 47 años. Su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general, tiene más 6 años en este negocio. Inicio este negocio por la necesidad de sufragar los ingresos de su hogar. Este crédito es para la compra de calzado, perfumes, cremas, shampoo, jabones, sabanas y ropa en general. Su sueño es tener más capital y tener más mercadería en el negocio. Ella tiene mucha experiencia en este negocio, pues sus clientes saben muy bien que siempre ofrece buenos productos de calidad ella ha sido muy responsable con sus cuotas.
texts.en: Hada Francis is 47 years old.  Her business is selling general merchandise.  She has been in this business for more than six years.  She started her business because she needed to cover her household expenses.  She will use this loan to buy footwear, perfumes, creams, shampoo, soap, sheets and clothes.  Her dream is to have more capital and to have more merchandise for her business.  She has a lot of experience and her customers know that she always sells good-quality products.  She has been very responsible in making her loan repayments.

loans.use: to buy footwear, perfumes, creams, shampoo, soap, sheets and clothes

loans.name: Segundo Benitos

texts.es:
Segundo es un hombre soltero de 56 años, posee una casa propia con los servicios de agua y luz, ubicada en el anexo  Santa Rosa (lugar donde existen muy pocas viviendas y pobladores ),el cual se encuentra a unos 15 minutos del distrito de Mórrope y a unos 30 minutos del departamento de Lambayeque.  Lugar donde se desarrolla  la actividad agricola,  ganadera y  por sus festividades religiosas.

Segundo se dedica a lacompra y venta de animales de todas las especies (aves de corral, vacas chanchos,etc.) desde hace unos años, su negocio lo realiza en el mercado Moshoqueque de la ciudad de Chiclayo los días martes donde hay mayor cantidad de clientela y así puede vender más rápido sus animales.  Con esos ingresos pude ayudarse  a cubrir sus necesidades. Otra forma de tener un poco más de ingresos económicos es alquilando su mototaxi (medio de transporte público pequeño).

El crédito solicitado por Segundoa Edpyme Alternativa es de 3000 nuevos soles para comprar más animales  y seguir negociandolo como siempre lo hace en el mercado Moshoqueque al por mayor y menor. Una vez que haya realizado las ventas de sus animales podrá pagar su préstamo como tener una mejor calidad de vida.

Segundoes un hombre muy conocido por ser trabajador, responsable y dedicado ha su negocio.
texts.en:
Segundo is a 56 year-old single man.  He owns his own home which has access to water and electricity.  His home is located in the small village of Santa Rosa (a place where there are very few houses and inhabitants), 15 minutes from Mórrope district, 30 minutes from Lambayeque department.  This is a place where people work in farming and livestock raising and it is known for its religious festivals.

Segundo has been buying and selling all kinds of animals (poultry, cows, pigs, etc.) for some years now.  He carries out his business in Moshoqueque market, in the city of Chiclayo, on Tuesdays.  This is when there are most customers and he can sell his animals most quickly.  With this income, he is able to cover his needs.  Another way in which he makes a little extra income is by hiring out his motorcycle taxi (a small mode of public transport).

Segundo is requesting a loan for 3,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa to buy more animals and continue trading wholesale and retail, as he always does, in Moshoqueque market.  Once he has sold his animals, he will be able to repay his loan and also enjoy a better quality of life.

Segundo is a man who is very well known for being hard-working, responsible and devoted to his business.

loans.use: to buy more animals of different kinds and to have maintenance work done on his motorcycle taxi

location.town: Anexo Santa Rosa - Lagunas - Mórrope - Lambayeque

loans.name: Las Dueñas I Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama “ LAS DUEÑAS I”, está integrado por 10 personas en este grupo se encuentra la señora Gabriela V. M. de 30 años de edad, tiene 2 hijos de 4 y 8 años de edad, su negocio es una Pastelería desde hace aproximadamente 11 años que se dedica a este negocio, ella quiere continuar invertiendo para que mucha gente conozca su producto ya que recientemente abrió una nueva sucursal y esta creciendo poco a poco por esta razón necesita los prestamos para continuar con sus sueños e invertir en más materia prima y fortalezca su negocio. Sus planes a futuro son expandir más su negocio con la apertura de más puntos de venta y brindarles a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida, tamién quiere ver a sus hijos conm una carrera profesional para que logren sus sueños y la vean como un ejemplo a sehuir.
texts.en:
This group is called "LAS DUEÑAS I” and has ten members.  30 year-old Gabriela V. M. is a member of this group.  She has two children aged 4 and 8.

Gabriela's business is a cake shop and she has been in the business for approximately 11 years.  She would like to continue investing so that lots of people become familiar with her products since she recently opened a new branch and it is growing gradually.  She needs loans to continue making her dreams a reality, to invest in more raw materials and to strengthen her business.  Her plans for the future are to further expand her business by opening more sales locations and to provide her children with a better quality of life.  She would also like to see her children become professionals so that they can achieve their dreams.  She would like them to see her as an example to follow.

loans.use: to invest in raw materials for her cake shop

loans.name: Erika

texts.es:
Erika P. P., tiene la edad 34 años, está casada y vive con sus 3 hijos que son sus mayores prioridades. Ella pretende con el dinero realizar la compra de una máquina para costura y así elaborará ropa para la venta. Ella pretende con esta inversión dar trabajos con un mejor acabado y mayor calidad. Ella cuenta con varios años de experiencia y cuenta con varios clientes por lo cual quiere ofrecerles mejores trabajos. Ella quiere generar más ganancias para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio para crecer y darle a sus hijos mejores condiciones en el futuro.
Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Erika P. P. is 34 years old, married, and lives with her three children who are her main priority.  She plans to use her money to buy a sewing machine so that she can make clothes to sell.  She plans, through this investment, to be able to provide a better finish to her garments and make them better quality.  She has several years experience and has several customers who she would like to be able to provide with better work.

Erika would like to make more profits so that she can continue investing in her business in order to grow and provide her children with better conditions in the future.

This is the first loan that Erika has received from FUDECOSUR.  She has not received any previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR has provided her this loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy a machine for making clothes

loans.name: Edwin And Maria

texts.en:
Many years ago, Edwin worked at a large bank where his sole job was to count cash. “I didn’t feel like I was being treated with respect,” he recalled. “One day I realized the job was not for me, and I could do something else. I could be my own boss.” 
 
Not long after that, Edwin and his wife, Maria, started a family-owned janitorial and handyman repair business. Thirty years later, the business is still going strong and now employs two additional workers to help manage a wide variety of jobs that range from installing tile in houses to gardening to cleaning office buildings.
 
The couple’s favorite part of running a small business is the flexibility it affords them. They work hard, but have the freedom to create their own schedule and spend more time with family. “As my own boss there’s nobody telling me what to do – but that also comes with responsibility. You have to be disciplined. You can’t afford complaints from clients,” said Edwin.
 
Despite 30 years of experience and their strong work ethic, the recession has presented a significant challenge to the business: “When the economy is bad, things are tough, because people don’t have extra money to spend on fixing their houses.” 
 
In order to secure more work, Edwin and Maria needed capital, but many of the places they initially looked charged interest rates pushing 90%. Fortunately, their search also led them to Opportunity Fund, a local micro-lender, where they were approved for a $750 micro-loan (with an interest rate of 8%). With their loan, Edwin and Maria will be able to take on an extra account and build their credit for larger business loans in the future.

loans.use: to take on an extra janitorial account and build their credit history.

loans.name: Anacleta

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN ISIDRO D. YANAHURA 5TO PARADERO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia D. Urubamba y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Anacleta; ella tiene 40 años D. edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. venta D. chicha (bebida a base D. maíz) y también venD. jora que es producto que se usa para hacer la chicha, ella venD. en forma independiente en su casa desD. las 10:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia por medio D. este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio D. venta D. chicha. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar maíz al por mayor para preparar la chicha.                                    

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
Anacleta belongs to the “San Isidro D. Yanahura 5th Paradero” Communal bank, located in the district and province of Urubamba, in Cusco department.

Anacleta is 40 years old, lives with her partner, and has 4 children. She alternates her daily activities between selling 'chicha' (a native 'beer' maD. from corn) and selling  'jora' (the special corn used in making chicha). She sells independently from her house, from 10:00 am until 6:00 pm.  In this manner, Anacleta is advancing her children.

Anacleta wants to expand and improve her chicha-selling business. She is requesting a loan to buy jora at wholesale for preparing chicha.

Anacleta is happy about the loan and committed to complying with the scheduled payments.

loans.use: to buy a special corn at wholesale for preparing chicha.

loans.name: Brigida

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN ISIDRO D. YANAHURA 5TO PARADERO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia D. Urubamba y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Brigida; ella tiene 44 años D. edad y es casada y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. venta D. chicha (bebida a base D. maíz) y también tiene un terreno D. cultivo donD. siembra maíz y papa, la socia venD. la chicha en su casa en el distrito D. Urubamba, la socia por medio D. este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio D. venta D. chicha. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar maíz y choclos para preparar la chicha.                                  

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
Brigida belongs to the San Isidro D. Yanahura 5th  Paradero Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Urubamba district, Urubamba province, Cusco department.

Brigida is 44 years old, married, and has five children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business of selling “chicha” (a drink maD. from corn).  She also has a piece of land where she grows corn and potatoes.  She sells chicha at her house in the Urubamba district.  It is through this business that she gets her children ahead.

She wants to expand her business of selling chicha.  She is requesting the loan to buy corn and corn cobs.

She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy corn and corn cobs to make "chicha" (a drink made from corn).

loans.name: Duo San Juan De Dios Group

texts.es:
Dúo San Juan de Dios:
El dúo  San Juan de Dios ,este grupo esta conformado por la representante del grupo quien es Olga madre de 4 niño ella se dedica a la venta de cosméticos además de ropa para bebe la cual le ha sido muy rentable ella solicita este crédito para la compra de cosméticos y para la compra de ropa de bebe.

Alicia es madre de 4 niños también  ella se dedica a vender verduras, y esta solicitando este crédito para la compra de verduras ya que esta conciente de que nececita mas capital para trabajar ella nos cuenta que se siente muy contenta porque su negocio a prosperado  hambas tienen a sus niños en las escuelas del municipio,  los diferentes negocios que tienen son muy rentables por lo mismo están  solicitando un crédito nuevamente ya que para esta temporada de Semana Santa hay mas negocio ellas demostraron sus  puntualidad en las cuotas mensuales por lo que prometen pagar de la misma manera si se les llegara a autorizar un crédito mas ya  que esto ayudaría a que sus hijos se desenvuelva mas y así ser personas de éxito.
texts.en:
San Juan de Dios Duo: Olga is a member of the duo named "San Juan de Dios" and she is the representative of the group. She is the mother of 4 children and she sells cosmetics and baby clothes. It has been a profitable business. She requests a loan to purchase cosmetics and baby clothing. 

Alicia is the mother of 4 children and she sells vegetables. She requests a loan to purchase vegetables. She is aware of the fact that she needs more working capital. She says that she is very happy because her business has been profitable. 

Both have their children attending schools in the municipality. The different businesses they have are very profitable which is why the request a new loan. During this season of Holy Week there is more business. They have both demonstrated punctuality with their monthly payments and they promise to continue making their payments in the same manner if a loan is granted to them again. This will help their children to develop and to grow up to be successful people.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics and baby clothing.

loans.name: Marvin Francisco

texts.es: Marvin Francisco se dedica a un taller de carpintería. Tiene más de 16 años en este medio de vida. El siempre ha sabido administrar muy bien su negocio y los créditos siempre los enfoca en su actividad. A pesar de los problemas que ha enfrentado como las restricciones que tiene el magfor para la extracción de madera, pues esto hace que el precio de la misma aumente debido a los escases este crédito es para la compra de madera, herramientas, materiales, entre otros productos.
texts.en:
Marvin Francisco works in a carpentry shop.  He has been doing this for over 16 years.  He has always known how to manage his business very well.

He always uses the loans for his business activity in spite of the problems he has faced, like the restrictions that MAGFOR (Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry) has for the extraction of wood.  This makes the price go up due to the scarcity of wood.

This loan is to buy tools, materials, and other products.

loans.use: to buy tools, materials, and other products.

loans.name: Ynes

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN ISIDRO D. YANAHURA 5TO PARADERO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia D. Urubamba y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ynes; ella tiene 62 años D. edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. venta D. hortalizas y frutas, la socia también tiene un terreno donD. cultiva frutas como manzanas, naranjas, mandarinas y entre otras frutas y también siembra zanahorias, cebollas y lechugas y luego los venD. en el mercado D. Urubamba, ella venD. en forma ambulatoria, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio D. venta D. frutas y hortalizas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar semillas y fertilizantes para la tierra D. cultivo.                           
       
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
Ynes is a member of the San Isidro D. Yanahura 5th Paradero Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Urubamba district, Urubamba province, Cusco department.

Ynes, age 62, is in a common-law marriage and has one child.  She alternates her daily activities with her business of selling fruits and vegetables.  She also has land where she grows fruits like apples, oranges, mandarins, and other fruits.  She also grows carrots, onions, and lettuce.  She later sells them at the Urubamba market in an itinerant manner.

She wishes to expand her business of selling fruits and vegetables.  She is requesting the loan to buy seeds and fertilizers for her fields.

She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for her fields.

loans.name: Juila

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN ISIDRO DE YANAHURA 5TO PARADERO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Julia; ella tiene 44 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de pasamanería, ella vende todo lo que es productos de limpieza como detergentes, ambientadores y también vende productos de belleza, ella vende en forma ambulatoria, por medio de este negocio la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de pasamanería. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como detergentes y ambientadores al por mayor. 
                                 
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Julia is a member of the "San Isidro de Yanahuro 5to Paradero" community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Julia is 44 years old, married, and has three children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling an assortment of merchandise.  She sells all sorts of cleaning products such as detergents and air fresheners.  She also sells beauty products.  She makes her sales as an itinerant street vendor and she would like to use this loan to expand her business.  She is requesting this loan to buy merchandise such as detergents and air fresheners wholesale.

Julia is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as detergents and air fresheners wholesale

loans.name: Hector Urbano

texts.es:
Héctor es padre de 3 niños, tiene 34 años de edad y vive junto a su esposa en una casa ubicada en el distrito de Pitipo, provincia de Ferreñafe. Este lugar se caracteriza por ser un sector agrícola y por estar habitado de gente emprendedora que se identifica con el refrán de la localidad que dice: “Ferreñafe es la ciudad de la doble fe”.

Con más de 6 años  de experiencia en el buen manejo de las tierras, Héctor se dedica  al cultivo del maíz amarillo duro.

Héctor solicita un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3000 nuevos soles que utilizará para el mantenimiento de 2 hectáreas de maíz amarillo duro, comprando fertilizantes y pesticidas entre otras cosas, para poder tener un mayor rendimiento por hectárea. Esto le permitirá expandir su negocio obteniendo mayores ganancias para el bienestar de sus 3 hijos.

Héctor cuenta con buena reputación en Edpyme Alternativa, pues con anterioridad éste ha tenido tres créditos cancelados con puntualidad y responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Héctor is a 34 year-old father of three.  He lives together with his wife in their home which is located in Pitipo district, in Ferreñafe province.  This is known as an agricultural area which is inhabited by entrepreneurial people who identify with the local saying "Ferreñafe is the city of two faiths".

Héctor has more than six years experience in managing his land well.  He grows hard yellow corn.

Héctor is requesting a loan for 3,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa which he will use to look after his two hectares of hard yellow corn.  He will buy fertilizers, pesticides and other products so that he can obtain a higher per-hectare yield.  This will allow him to expand his business and make more profits for the well-being of his three children.

Héctor has a good reputation with Edpyme Alternativa as he has had three previous loans which he repaid punctually and responsibly.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides for his land

loans.name: Manuel Jesus

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SAN ISIDRO DE YANAHURA 5TO PARADERO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Manuel Jesus; el tiene 50 años de edad y es casado y tiene 2 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de panadería, el prepara panes y luego lo vende en su casa en forma independiente, el socio por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de panadería.  El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos como harina, manteca y azúcar para preparar los panes.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Manuel Jesus is a member of the "San Isidro de Yanahura 5to Paradero" community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Manuel Jesus is 50 years old, married, and has two children.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his bakery business.  He makes bread which he then sells at home independently.  Through his business, he manages to get his children ahead in life.  Manuel Jesus would like to expand and improve his bakery business.  He is requesting a loan to buy supplies such as flour, butter and sugar to make bread.

Manuel Jesus is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as flour, butter and sugar to make bread

loans.name: Galdys

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN ISIDRO DE YANAHURA 5TO PARADERO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Galdys; ella tiene 42 años de edad y es casada y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de preparación y venta de chicha, ella vende en forma ambulatoria llevando a lugares como Quillabamba y lo distribuye a bares y otras picanterías, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de chicha. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos como maíz y leña para preparar la chicha. 

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Galdys is a member of the "San Isidro de Yanahura 5to Paradero" community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Galdys is 42 years old, married, and has five children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business making and selling 'chicha' (a traditional, corn-based drink).  She does not make her sales from a fixed location.  She sells her product in places such as Quillabamba.  She sells to bars and restaurants.  Galdys would like to expand and improve her 'chicha' business.  She is requesting this loan to buy supplies such as corn and firewood for making 'chicha'.

Galdys is happy to be receiving this loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as corn and firewood for making 'chicha'

loans.name: Percy

texts.es: Percy tiene 18 años, vive con sus padres en casa propia. Desde su niñez ha aprendido por medio de su madre este oficio que hoy es una fuente de trabajo, él se dedica a la costura de trajes típicos. Es así que las señoras de su zona acuden a él para este tipo de servicio, además por el gusto por el detalle y el empeño que pone en cada labor, logrando conseguir la calidad que deseaba en sus prendas. Este trabajo es muy flexible ya que administra su tiempo, de esa manera no descuida otras cosas primordiales que tiene, como el de estudiar. Ha visto nuevos lugares donde pueda vender sus productos a parte de las ferias comerciales que hay en su zona y conseguir nuevos clientes que venden al por menor sus prendas para lo cual tiene planeado implementar más su taller de costura. Es su primer crédito con MFP,  recibe con gran entusiasmo este monto de dinero porque ya tiene planeado en que invertirá y así mismo agradece por la confianza depositada en su persona  ya que no defraudara en ser responsable en sus pagos. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de telas e hilos al por mayor para sus confecciones.
texts.en:
Percy, 18, lives with his parents in their own house.  Since childhood his mother taught him the occupation which today is his source of work: he sews traditional costumes.  Women in his area come to him for this type of service and also because of the detailed work he does and the degree of effort he puts into each article of clothing attaining the quality he wants in his items. This work is very flexible; he manages his own time so as not to neglect other important things he has to do, like studying.

He’s seen new places where he can sell his wares as part of the commercial markets that take place in his zone and acquire new customers who will sell his items at retail so he intends to better supply his workshop.  

This is his first loan with MFP.  He happily receives the amount of money because he already has plans on how to invest it.  He is grateful for the trust placed in him and he will not disappoint and will be responsible with his payments.

He will use the requested loan to buy fabric and thread for his creations at wholesale.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread at wholesale.

loans.name: Maria Angelica

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SAN ISIDRO DE YANAHURA 5TO PARADERO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Maria Angelica; ella tiene 45 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de animales y también tiene una tierras de cultivo donde siembra maíz y verduras como zanahorias, lechugas y cebollas y después lo vende en el mercado de Urubamba, con respecto a la crianza de animales la socia vende cuyes y chanchos y también los vende en forma ambulatoria, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de animales y verduras. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar alimentos para los animales y comprar fertilizantes para mejorar la tierra de cultivo.
 
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
María Angélica, 45, is a member of the “SAN ISIDRO DE YANAHURA 5TO PARADERO” communal bank located in Urubamba District which belongs to Urubamba Province, Cusco Department.

She has a spouse and two children.  She alternates her daily chores with a business raising livestock; she also has farmland where she grows corn and vegetables like: carrots, lettuce and onions, that she then sells in Urubamba’s market.  With respect to the animals she raises, she sells guinea pigs and pigs as a street vendor.  She wants to expand and improve her animal and vegetable sales businesses and is asking for a loan to buy animal feed and fertilizer to improve her farmland.

She is happy about the loan and commits to repay.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Jose De Los Santos

texts.es:
José es  un hombre casado de 45 años de edad que vive en una casa propia con su esposa y sus 2 menores hijos  ubicada en el  zona rural del caseríode Caracucho a unos 15 minutos del distrito de Morrope, la misma que se  encuentra a unos  40 minutos de la provincia de Chiclayo, su casa cuenta  solamente con el servicio de agua.  Este distrito se caracteriza porque sus pobladores desarrollan la actividad de agricultura , ganadería, y también tienes festividades religiosas muy bonitas .

Desde hace 10 años José se dedica a la compra, crianza y venta de animales (ovejas y cabritos), su corral lo tiene en la parte externa de su casa para mayor segurida y comodidad.  Sus animales se venden rápido en los mercados que los ofrece por estar bien alimentados con comida balanceada y pastos naturales,  lo cual le permite a José aumentar sus ganancias para cubrir sus necesidades diarias.  Otra actividad ha la que se dedica es la apicultura (personas dedicadas al cultivo de miel de abeja).

Por lo mismo José a solicitado un préstamo  de 3000 nuevos soles a Edpyme Aleternativa para la renovación de cajas para sus colmenas y así pueda obtener miel de mejor calidad, para colacarla a mejor precio en los diferentes mercados y supermercados. Al incrementar sus ventas podrá solventar sus gastos y de paso hacerse mas conicido en los distintos lugares que vende por tener un producto de calidad.

José es conocido por los comerciantes de la zona y en de los distintos mercados donde ofrece sus productos por ser un hombre honesto, trabajador y con muchas ganas de  mejorar en la vida, brindándoles a sus hijos una mejor oportunidad en la sociedad donde se desarrollan.
texts.en:
José, 45, is married living in his own house with his wife and two minor children located in a rural zone of Caracucho Hamlet about 15 minutes from Mórrope District which in turn is about 40 minutes from Chiclayo Province.  His house only has running water.  The district is characterized by its residents who are farmers, raise livestock and also have very beautiful religious festivals.

For the last ten years José has been raising animals (sheep and goats) to sell.  He has his corral outside his house for more security and comfort.  His animals sell quickly in the markets where he sells them because they are well fed with nutritionally balanced feed and natural grasses which make it possible for José to increase profits to meet daily expenses.  Another activity he’s involved in is beekeeping (people dedicated to honey production).

Because of this, José has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 3000 new sol loan to renovate the boxes his hives are in so that he can attain better quality honey and be able to sell it at a better price in the various markets and supermarkets.  By increasing his sales he’ll be able to meet expenses while becoming better known in the different places he sells because of having a good quality product.

José is known by the local merchants and in the various markets where he sells his products as being an honest, hard working man with a strong drive to improve in life providing his children with better opportunities in the society they are developing in.

loans.use: to renew his bee hives.

loans.name: Bernardo

texts.es: Bernardo tiene 63  años, es viudo y vive en su casa propia. Toda su vida se ha dedicado a la agricultura y crianza de animales, su único medio de transporte es su burro con el que se transporta a considerables distancias para ir a sus terrenos de cultivos y ver todos los días en que estado se viene desarrollando y evitar la plaga de insectos que pueden afectar seriamente sus cosechas. Asimismo tiene ovejas y vacas que cuida en su establo y las lleva al campo a pastear, por ello se levanta en las madrugadas, soportando los días de intenso calor o las intensas lluvias, pero él acostumbrado al clima y al ritmo de vida que no es impedimento  para continuar trabajando. Es su primer crédito  que tiene con MFP, se siente muy contento de pertenecer a su banco comunal porque tiene buenas expectativas de trabajo y aprender más sobre el aspecto financiero por lo que se compromete a ser responsable en sus pagos. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en la compra de sacos de abono para esta temporada de siembra y cultivar pastizales para el alimento de sus animales y demás productos en sus terrenos.
texts.en:
Bernardo, 63, is a widower living in his own house.  She’s spent his entire life farming and raising livestock.  His only means of transportation is his donkey that he uses to travel considerable distances to visit his fields and check up on them daily to see what state they are in and avoid insect infestations that can seriously affect his crops.  He also cares for sheep and cattle in his stable and takes them to the countryside to pasture. Because of this he rises at dawn withstanding either the intense heat or intense rainfall.  But, he’s used to the weather and the rhythm of life that are no barriers to continue working.

This is his first loan with MFP and he is very happy to belong to a communal bank because he has good expectations for work and to learn more about the financial aspects; he commits to be responsible with his payments.

He will use the loan he’s asking for to buy sacks of manure for the current planting season and to farm pasture to feed his animals as well as other products in his fields.

loans.use: to buy sacks of manure.

loans.name: Yefer

texts.es:
Yefer es un hombre de 31 años de edad  que tiene 2 hijos a su cargo. Vive con sus hijos y esposa en un caserío del distrito de Tambogrande -  departamento de Piura. Lamentablemente el hogar de Yefer no cuenta con los servicios básicos, como luz, agua y desagüe.

Desde hace más de 4 años la actividad que desarrolla Yefer es la agricultura y ganadería. Él cuenta con un terreno agrícola de 1 hectárea en el cual tiene limón en producción que cosecha semanalmente. Además,  actualmente Yefer cría 15 ovejas.

Yefer solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo e 1000 nuevos soles que utilizará para la compra de fertilizantes para el cultivo de limón y  para  realizar labores de poda y deshierbo.  Otra parte del préstamo será invertida en la compra de alimentos para el engorde de ovinos, que mejorarán su calidad y le permitirá, a Yefer, venderlos a un mejor precio beneficiando así su negocio. 

Con la ganancia obtenida con el desarrollo de su negocio, Yefer pretende mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, que actualmente es muy pobre.
texts.en:
Yefer is a 31 year old man who has two children in his care.  He lives with his children and his wife in a hamlet in Tambogrande District – Piura Department.  Sadly, Yafer’s house does not have basic utilities like electricity, water and sewage.

For over four years Yafer has been farming and raising livestock.  He has a one hectare field planted with lemons that he harvests weekly.  He’s also raising 15 sheep.

Yafer is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan that he’ll use to buy fertilizer for his lemon crops and to carry out tasks like pruning and weeding.  Another part of the loan will be used to buy sheep feed that will improve their quality and allow Yafer to sell them at a better price for his business’ benefit.

Yafer plans to use profits from his business to improve his family’s quality of life which is currently very poor.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and feed for his livestock.
